When reciting the scripture, first visualize white qi, then purple qi, emanating from the centers of both palms, both soles, and the navel, swirling around the body and filling the chamber. After encircling the heavens once, it returns to the body, merging with the sun and moon.

The Master said: The three cinnabar fields of a person each contain true earth. Whenever after the hour of *zi*, gather the true qi of the left and right kidneys within the lower cinnabar field’s primordial elixir. Visualize it as five-colored, coiling ninefold, with true nature contained at its center. Employ the method of ten revolutions with intention, sending it upward along the ram’s horns path to reach directly the mud-pill palace. There, the true qi merges, then descends from the jade tower, lingering in the Yellow Court to blend with the heart’s qi. Again, circulate it upward along the spine, tracing the mud-pill palace once more, then descend back to the Yellow Court. Visualize in the Yellow Court a Heavenly Venerable in your own likeness, who imbibes this true qi. From the hours of *zi* and *wu*, perform this method thrice. After the hour of *wu*, instead use the heart’s fire to descend into the Yellow Court, imagining the Heavenly Venerable seated amidst great flames, serene and unmoving, in accordance with the method of sitting in forgetfulness.

**Method of Returning the Breath**
With every exhalation rising from the cinnabar field, visualize the breath received into the Yellow Court, where the Heavenly Venerable swallows it. With every inhalation entering through the nose, likewise visualize the breath received into the Yellow Court, where the Heavenly Venerable swallows it. For all matters of aiding the living and delivering the dead, or any action undertaken, the Heavenly Venerable emerges from the Yellow Court to reside in the mud-pill palace, uniting the qi of the five viscera, all within the Primordial Palace.

**Silent Audience and Refining the Crown**
The Master said: At the three hours of *yin*, *wu*, and *xu* each day, enter stillness. First, refine the crown with the hand seal to open the Heavenly Gate, then transform the spirit. This is the oral transmission of ascent personally bestowed by the Primordial Beginning upon the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct and the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign. Keep it secret.

*Jin-yin-zha-chou, jin-chen-zha-mao, da-zhong-li-zhong-shang-quan.*

At noon, emerge—this is governed by the left year. Next, raise both hands in the *jing* mudra, visualize the body as the Perfected White Crane Immortal, and by this method, perceive the Heavenly Gate opening. A white crane arrives; visualize the self mounting the crane and ascending lightly until reaching the summit of the Three Heavens, where the Primordial Beginning’s crown radiates nine-colored golden light, pouring into one’s own crown. Then imagine the myriad apertures of the body streaming with light, illuminating the ten directions of the world. When complete, remount the crane and return to one’s abode. This is the secret oral transmission of the Numinous Treasure received from the Primordial Beginning. When making petitions, prostrate before the royal steps to present them; when submitting memorials, follow this same method.

**The Method of Audience with the Origin**
It is said: When dwelling in peace with no affairs at hand, remain in a quiet chamber, burn incense, and concentrate the spirit so that it does not leave the body—only then may one take flight to attend the Origin. The method of audience with the Origin: visualize the Upper, Middle, and Lower Cinnabar Fields, each with its Heavenly Venerable. Then visualize the Heavenly Venerables of the Middle and Lower Fields, riding five-colored clouds of *qi* together with one’s own spirit from the Yellow Court, ascending through the Crimson Tower until reaching the Mud-Pill Palace. Visualize the three venerables seated in the Jade Bureau, while the self kneels lengthily before them to present matters. When finished, visualize the three venerables from the three realms riding three-colored clouds of *qi* to the Mud-Pill Palace, merging with the Heavenly Venerables of one’s own three fields to form three venerables. Then visualize these three venerables uniting as one, riding five-colored clouds of *qi* to descend through the Crimson Tower and enter the Yellow Court to reside, after which perform the stabilization method.

**True Stillness**
The Master said: The Dao of observing the mind requires inwardly observing the mind until the mind is no-mind. Externally observe the form until the form is no-form. Observe distant things until things are no-things. When these three are realized, only emptiness is seen. Observe emptiness until emptiness is no-emptiness. When the object of emptiness is gone, even no-emptiness is no more. When no-emptiness is no more, there is only profound and constant stillness. Stillness without object—how could desire arise? When desire does not arise, this is true stillness. Responding to things with true constancy, attaining the nature with true constancy, constantly responding and constantly still, one is constantly pure and still. One who can be thus will find the body attaining emptiness and nothingness, the nature returning to the Supreme Ultimate, and may then interact with things and benefit others, transcending the subtle to enter sagehood. This is the correct Dao, and its practice is essential. From this path, one proceeds from non-being into being, practicing the method of merging with the sun and moon, nurturing the sacred embryo to completion. In dreams and waking, there is no difference. Only then may one practice the great *Dong* method of revolving the wind, attaining a sagely body of health and freedom, able to roam the myriad heavens at will and pay homage at the Golden Towers of Emptiness and Nothingness.

**The Method of Sleeping at Night**
The Master said: When retiring, first stretch out the hands and feet and lie supine. Then visualize the five viscera, and afterward visualize the Heavenly Venerable seated serenely in the Yellow Court, radiating great light that illuminates the ten directions. At this moment, forget body and mind, and turn attention inward to observe the original spirit from one’s initial birth—how it congealed, how it daily employed and directed the body, how it lodged within, and how it will one day depart. Ponder this deeply. At first, the spirit’s awareness may be dim, but after a short while, the mind’s ground becomes suddenly clear, sensing the four *qi* at peace, the sun and moon casting their light in dual illumination within the Mysterious Palace. The visualized Heavenly Venerable sits distinctly, without a trace of dust or obscurity. One may hear the wondrous music of the immortal palaces and witness all manner of marvelous and extraordinary sights in the world. However, one must not cling to appearances, lest the spirit drift and wander—this is the clarity of one’s original nature, what the scriptures call “perceiving the Jade Clarity realm in profound stillness.” One must continue practicing the method of merging the sun and moon daily to nurture the original nature, valuing the strength of the yang spirit, which enables instantaneous travel over ten thousand miles. When initial desires arise, one must firmly stabilize body and mind, lest instability lead to madness.

**The Method of Substituting Form to Avert Calamity and Achieve Corpse Liberation at Life’s End**
The Master said: The Dao of the Numinous Treasure possesses a spirit-summoning staff to command the ghostly deities of the Six Heavens and direct the myriad numina of the Three Realms. The method for crafting the staff: select a pure and numinous altar in a blessed mountain, auspicious land, or sacred precinct. On a propitious day, take a sweet bamboo stalk facing the sun, six feet in length with twelve nodes. Choose an *jia-wu*, *bing-wu*, or *ding-mao* day, or the third day of the third month, fifth day of the fifth month, seventh day of the seventh month, or ninth day of the ninth month. On the third node from the top, slightly curve the right side, and on the curved indentation, carve the sun and moon above and the Dipper below. Open a cavity at the top and insert the talisman of the Central Guardian Scribe. Below the second node, open four cavities on the four sides and insert the talismans of the Four Directional Guardian Scribes, sealing them with wax. On the lower portion, carve the names of the Numinous Treasure Heavenly Venerables of the Ten Directions, who respond to transformations across kalpas. When complete, make a yellow silk bag to hold the staff, its length matching the staff. Beginning on the first day, recite the incantation facing the five directions at the corresponding days and hours, drawing in the *qi* of the five directions with breaths. Each night, perform visualization; after a year, when the *qi* is sufficient, the staff may be employed.

Another method: The staff is five feet five inches long with nine nodes. Curve the left side of the second node, and below the third node, open cavities on four sides to insert the talismans of the names of the Five Peaks, filling the interior with the *Middle Chapter of the Numinous Writ*. If used for personal cultivation, insert the Five Talismans of the Numinous Treasure into the staff. Another method uses a straight staff without curves.

The method of receiving and maintaining the staff: Keep it with you at all times when sitting, lying, rising, or resting. If there is a place where it cannot be carried, place it in a clean location. After long maintenance, pointing the staff at the heavens will cause celestial deities to pay homage; pointing it at the earth will cause earthly spirits to send off and welcome. Pointing it at the northeast will cause myriad ghosts to bind themselves; pointing it to break open hells will cause the dead to return to life. Whatever calamity or misfortune it points to will collapse and vanish at its command.

With prolonged and devoted practice, the qi stirs deeply—discard your garments and cover the bamboo, and you may conceal your form to enter and exit unseen.

When using the staff to break open hells, suspend a small yellow pennant beneath the second node, seven inches in length. Upon the pennant, inscribe the talisman of the Ten Directions’ Savior Heavenly Worthy and the Ten Celestial Transmutations Talisman. For other applications, such as regular carrying and maintenance, remove the pennant.

For all acts of spiritual work, strike the teeth thirty-six times in succession. Visualize the five Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors, each clad in the color of their respective direction, along with the Jade Maidens of the Five Emperors, who attend with staffs and banners, their five-colored radiance streaming upon the staff. Recite the subtle incantation:

On the Mountain of the Great Yang,
The primordial essence of the Original Beginning.
Heaven unfolds, earth extends,
Sweet bamboo channels the numinous.
Direct Talismans and guardian officers,
Divisions of divine soldiers stand guard.
Five hues flow and gleam,
Crimson robes and golden tassels.
Assisting the Two Perfected,
Exiting darkness, entering shadow.
Summoning heaven, heaven bows;
Commanding earth, earth welcomes.
Pointing at ghosts, ghosts perish;
Demons and malevolent spirits bind themselves.
Numinous talisman, divine staff,
Mighty dominion over the ten thousand directions.
With me they complete,
With me they arise.
After ten thousand kalpas,
They take my form in my stead.
This is the Fivefold Liberation,
Ascending as an immortal to the Upper Clarity.
By the talisman’s decree and command,
None dare disobey.

After reciting the incantation, draw in the true qi of the five directions, swallowing thirty-six times to conclude. Alternatively, on the Three Primes, the eight solar terms, one’s birth date, or other auspicious days, perform the practice with reverence: burn incense, bow in homage, and recite the mantra. With daily devotion, undiminished spirit, and unwavering focus, the divine perfected will manifest in form, and the staff shall bear one aloft in flight. When merit is complete and virtue perfected, the staff may temporarily assume one’s form—suddenly, in the blink of an eye, one becomes a perfected immortal.

The Way of the Fivefold Liberation is the true void of the Five Phases, seizing the balance of the Northern Dipper, escaping the calamity of death, achieving liberation through the corpse, and ascending as a spirit to the Upper Clarity.

**Wood Liberation Method**
Each day, face east and recite the incantation ninety times. Drink a cup of fragrant decoction, visualizing the staff as your own form. After nine years, you may achieve liberation through wood.

Incantation:
*Wen-bo draws the crow and fish,
Bo draws ga-ye,
Bo draws the Three Terraces,
Bo draws this sun.
Born in body, crossing the Dao,
Forty-nine merits ascend,
A thousand transformations, ten thousand changes,
Concealing the self to rise to the Upper Clarity,
The staff transforms into my form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

**Metal Liberation Method**
Each day, face west and recite the incantation seventy times. Drink a cup of fragrant decoction, visualizing the staff as your own form. After seven years, you may achieve liberation through metal.

Incantation:
*The Three Terraces give birth to me, transmit the Dharma,
The Three Terraces nourish me, pursue heaven,
The Three Terraces protect me, ascend as an immortal.
Passing through wind, crossing the foot,
Severing karmic retribution, restoring original form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

**Water Liberation Method**
Each day, face north and recite the incantation fifty times. Drink a cup of fragrant decoction, visualizing the staff as your own form. After five years, you may achieve liberation through water.

Incantation:
*The numinous turtle scatters qi,
Entering my staff.
I possess the great Dao,
Unlike the common world.
Emerging with the sun, entering with the moon,
Driving tigers, pursuing dragons.
Depart to transform in my stead,
Linked with the springs and veins.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

**Fire Liberation Method**
Each day, face south and recite the incantation thirty times. Drink a cup of fragrant decoction, visualizing the staff as your own form. After three years, you may achieve liberation through fire.

Incantation:
*The Vermilion Bird abides before me,
I grasp the power of creation.
The Three Officials guard my life,
The Five Emperors ensure my wholeness.
Zhibo wu, the spirit fire transforms,
Uniting my nature and spirit.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

**Earth Liberation Method**
Each day, face upward toward heaven, stand facing east, and recite the incantation twelve times. Drink a cup of fragrant decoction, visualizing the staff as your own form. After twelve years, you may achieve liberation through earth.

Incantation:
*The Primordial Yellow Dragon,
Thriving in the four seasons.
Central Palace holds the true position,
Wielding the mechanism’s power.
Master of the upper controllers,
I serve the imperial kalpa.
Now you replace me,
Assuming my authority in proxy.*

**Numerical Hold of Eighteen, the Cycle of Wu and Ji.**
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!

**Five Peaks’ Inner Name Talismans**
- Green earth, red script
- Red earth, yellow script
- White earth, black script
- Black earth, white script
- Yellow earth, white script

The five talismans above are to be inserted into the staff according to their respective directions.

**Five Emperors’ Prison-Breaking Staff Talisman**
*Gold / Gate / Transforms / Body / True / Qi / Circulates / Wisdom / Wisdom / Radiant / Splendor / Golden / Tiger / Breaks / Dark*

Here ends *The Supreme Purity Numinous Treasure Great Rites, Scroll Five*.
*Scroll Six of the Supreme Purity Numinous Treasure Great Rites*
Compiled by Wang Qizhen, Disciple of the Three Caverns of Supreme Purity, Ordained Master of the Numinous Treasure Tradition, under the transmission of Master Xiao Quan-Zhen, the Illuminating and Salvific Perfected of the Cavernous Subtlety, High Daoist of the Luminous Dawn

At that time, during the Primordial Radiance Era, the Most High commanded the Heavenly August Person to transmit the True Rites of the Inner Sounds of the Heavens, pacifying the myriad heavens, establishing the texts of Qian and Kun, regulating the stars, sun, and moon, and founding the ten thousand heavens. All the myriad sages and the myriad kinds of beings received the formation of the Most High’s Numinous Treasure and the true *qi* of the Primordial Heavenly Worthy, thereby attaining generation and completion. Each followed its inherent nature to receive its name.

This rite can deliver the myriad spirits of heaven and earth, as well as all Perfected and Sages who attain the Dao, for all receive the great *qi* of the True Rites of the Inner Sounds and the Great Brahma, thereby accomplishing the Great Dao. Scholars who practice this will all attain the Dao of ascension, for all Great Sages achieve sageliness through the True Rites of the Inner Sounds.

The Master said: In heaven above and earth below, those who obtain this sound can dispel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all. This is the natural sound of the Heavenly Perfected, called the True Rites of the Inner Sounds of the Heavens, which naturally establishes heaven and earth, Qian and Kun. If one encounters this rite, one must align above with earth, harmonize within with humanity, and further ensure that one’s actions are square and round, words do not harm beings, and one constantly practices the Dao of self-denial to save others. Only then can one practice the True Rites of the Inner Sounds of the Heavens and naturally attain the Dao of ascending to heaven. It is said that the August Lords of the Heavens, the various Kings, and the myriad Sages all achieve the ranks of Transcendent Officials through this rite. The True Rite is wondrous and weighty; the heavens unite in its merit. The heavens deliver beings, and this treasure is not transmitted lightly. In the world below, it is called the Rite of Inner Sounds, for the Primordial Heavenly Worthy transmits it to the world once every forty thousand kalpas. These eight characters of sound are the ancestral models of the heavens. It is said that this sound is the Dao of ascending to heaven, the root of entering sageliness, the gate of longevity, and the path to the heavens above. If one encounters this sound even once in ten thousand kalpas, one’s body attains the Dao and ascends to heaven, and one can further deliver the nine ancestors and seven generations, all attaining the Dao of divine transcendence. It is said that all Sages and Perfected, both in heaven and on earth, achieve the Dao of High Perfection through this rite. Thus, it is said: This sound delivers countless beings, serving as the ancestral root of the myriad Dao. Those who attain the Dao and become Perfected are as numerous as raindrops and mist; their merits and calculations are beyond reckoning. This rite has descended to the world once every four million years since ancient times. Those who encounter it traverse the Three Realms alone, ascend through the Golden Gate, and share the same lifespan as heaven.

**Method:**
For those cultivating life-nourishing and transcendence practices, on the tenth, full moon, new moon, and first and last quarter days of each month, write the jade characters in cinnabar. At dawn on these days, ingest them with pure water. Each month, ingest for eight days; after four months, the regimen is complete. Begin ingestion from the east, cycling repeatedly. The jade characters are naturally inscribed by the Heavenly True August Person, who formerly recorded the jade scripts of the Inner Sounds of the Heavens in the True Texts.

**Wearing the Inner Sounds of the East**
- *Danlou Ahui Wuqi Guanyin*, Great August Sovereign of the Zeng Heaven.
- *Xuyan Mingshou Falan Putan*, Grand Brilliance of the Jade Perfection Heaven.
- *Jiana Ayihu He Liuyin*, Clarity and Brightness of the He Tong Heaven.

On the tenth day of each month, write the first, second, and third characters. At dawn, face the *ren* direction to wear them, recite the Three Heavens Incantation, and uphold the practice as prescribed. After a hundred days, the hundred spirits will naturally attend your body. With prolonged practice, you may attain longevity and the Dao of ascending in broad daylight.

- *Huadu Quli Xianpu Yuzhen*, Mysterious Womb of the Heaven of Level Transformation.
- *Daluo Dafan Sanyan Qingyun*, Original Brilliance of the Heaven of Literary Manifestation.

On the full and new moon days of each month, write the fourth and fifth characters. Face east to wear them. After twenty-four years, you will naturally attain divine transcendence, longevity without death, and the Dao of ascension. Both in life and death, you may ascend to dwell upon the Southern Terrace of the Imperial Lord’s Leisure Pavilion, naturally soaring to the Great Luo Heaven.

- *Feisa Yudu Mingmo Shangmen*, Upper Brilliance of the Seven Luminaries’ Ma Yi Heaven.
- *Wuxing Shangshou Huijue Liuxuan*, Void and Vastness of the Yueheng Heaven.
- *Alu Longluo Sixiang Xufu*, Supreme Obscurity of the Tai Ji Meng Yi Heaven.

On the first and last quarter days of each month, write the sixth, seventh, and eighth characters. Face the moon to wear them, recite the mantra as prescribed. After eight years, your body will naturally radiate light, your face will turn golden, and both in life and death, you may ascend to the abodes of the sun and moon. Your body will attain divine transcendence, longevity, and enduring vision, sharing the same lifespan as heaven.

**Wearing the Inner Sounds of the South**
- *Nanyan Dongfu Yumou Tanxian*, Radiant Harmony of the Yang Heaven.
- *Fanxing Luokong Jiuling Tuiqian*, Reverent Brilliance of the Hua Heaven.
- *Zeluo Puta Lüluo Daqian*, Luminous Ancestry of the Piao Heaven.

On the tenth day of each month, write the first, second, and third characters. At dawn, face the *ren* direction to wear them, recite the Three Heavens Incantation, and uphold the practice as prescribed. After a hundred days, the myriad spirits will naturally attend your body, and you will attain longevity and the Dao of ascending in broad daylight.

- *Miaomang Jiuchou Shaoyao Lüchan*, Bamboo Grove of the Huang Jia Heaven.
- *Yunshang Jiudu Feisheng Ziqian*, Void Brilliance of the Tang Yao Heaven.

On the fifteenth and last days of each month, write the fourth and fifth characters, face the east to wear them, and after twenty-four years, you shall naturally attain ageless longevity and the Dao of ascending. In life and death alike, you will ascend to dwell in the Southern Pavilion of the Imperial Lord’s Wandering Hall, and your body will naturally ascend to the Great Canopy Heaven.

- *Nayou Yufu Moluo Falun*, Contemplative Clarity of the Guan Jing Heaven.
- *Luchi Yuanjing Lanzhi Yunrong*, Mystic Radiance of the Xuan Ming Gong Qing Heaven.
- *Fulang Kuoyi Shenying Zigong*, Supreme Brilliance of the Tai Huan Ji Yao Heaven.

On the first and last quarter days of each month, write the sixth, seventh, and eighth characters, face the moon to wear them, and after eight years, your body will radiate light, your countenance will gleam like gold, and in life and death alike, you will ascend to the abodes of the sun and moon. You will attain the Dao of divine immortality and longevity, sharing the same lifespan as heaven.

**Wearing the Inner Sounds of the West**
- *Daoli Chanyou Poni Gaotong*, Primordial Ascent of the Yuan Zai Kong Sheng Heaven.
- *Wansou Dise Damiao Zhitang*, Supreme Peace of the Tai An Huang Ya Heaven.
- *Liuluo Fanmeng Jingyuxiaoyu*, Manifest Serenity of the Xian Ding Ji Feng Heaven.

On the tenth day of each month, write the first, second, and third characters. At dawn, face the *ren* direction to wear them, recite the Three Heavens Incantation, and uphold the practice as prescribed. After a hundred days, the myriad spirits will naturally attend your body, and you will attain longevity and the Dao of ascending in broad daylight.

- *Yimiao Wuji Wanshou Shaodu*, Filial Purity of the Shi Huang Xiao Mang Heaven.
- *Ayu Yuzhu Hua Moyan You*, Grand Sovereignty of the Tai Huang Weng Chong Fu Rong Heaven.

On the fifteenth and last days of each month, write the fourth and fifth characters, face the east to wear them, and recite these sounds. After twenty-four years, you shall naturally attain ageless longevity and the Dao of ascending. In life and death alike, you will ascend to dwell in the Southern Pavilion of the Imperial Lord’s Wandering Hall, and your body will naturally ascend to the Great Canopy Heaven.

- *Jiukai Zibian Anapin Shou*, Boundless Flow of the Wu Si Jiang You Heaven.
- *Wuliang Fugai Fuluo Heshen*, Supreme Joy of the Shang Die Ruan Le Heaven.
- *Yudan Changsang Xiangkong Duxian*, Limitless Vow of the Wu Ji Tan Shi Heaven.

On the first and last quarter days of each month, write the sixth, seventh, and eighth characters, face the moon to wear them, and after eight years, your body will radiate light, your countenance will gleam like gold, and in life and death alike, you will ascend to the abodes of the sun and moon. You will attain the Dao of divine immortality and longevity, sharing the same lifespan as heaven.

**Wearing the Inner Sounds of the North**
- *Juewu Ziyu Jiuri Daoqian*, Luminous Purity of the Hao Ting Xiao Du Heaven.
- *Kunmu Shufu Xingshe Shangxuan*, Profound Unity of the Yuan Tong Yuan Dong Heaven.
- *Luluo Yumiao Miaoqi Heyun*, Wondrous Refinement of the Tai Wen Han Chong Miao Cheng Heaven.

On the tenth day of each month, write the first, second, and third true seal characters. At dawn, face the *ren* direction to wear them, recite the Three Heavens Incantation, and uphold the practice as prescribed. After a hundred days, the myriad spirits will naturally attend your body, and you will attain the Dao of ascending to the Upper Clarity.

- *Feitian Dachou Zongjian Shangtian*, Pristine Joy of the Tai Su Xiu Le Jin Shang Heaven.
- *Shatuo Jieliang Longhan Yingxian*, Eternal Harmony of the Tai Xu Yuan Shang Chang Rong Heaven.

On the fifteenth and last days of each month, write the fourth and fifth characters, face the east to wear them, and recite them. After twenty-four years, you shall naturally attain divine immortality, and in life and death alike, you will ascend to the Heaven of the Great Sage.

- *Biluo Fuli Kongge Baozhen*, Triumphant Ascent of the Tai Shi Yu Long Teng Sheng Heaven.
- *Eyi Wupin Dongmiao Zizhen*, Dragon Transformation of the Long Bian Fan Du Heaven.
- *Yuanfan Huimo Youji Duren*, Supreme Equilibrium of the Tai Ji Ping Yu Jia Yi Heaven.

On the first and last quarter days of each month, write the sixth, seventh, and eighth characters, face the moon to wear them, and recite the incantation. After eight years, your body will naturally radiate light, your countenance will gleam like gold, and in life and death alike, you will ascend to the abodes of the sun and moon, sharing the same lifespan as heaven.

In cultivating the Great Dao, one must always practice compassion to save all beings. Let beings be without attachment, purify the heart, be upright and solemn, free from deceit or crookedness. Cleanse the self and fast the mind, constantly contemplate all virtues. In speech with others, always be humble and harmonious. Your actions should align with heaven and earth, your words should not harm *qi*. Do not consume meat or fresh delicacies, nor take the lives of beings. Regard others’ lives as your own, others’ faults as your own, and others’ transgressions as if pondering the names of your parents.

Only when encountering such a person may one transmit the Inner Sounds of the Heavens and the method of ascending. For this method is most divine and sacred, transmitted but once in forty thousand kalpas. Those who encounter it in this world are those with the innate capacity to ascend to heaven. By forgetting the self and wearing these sounds, one will naturally ascend to the Upper Clarity, with the myriad spirits in attendance, earth spirits guarding the gate, one’s name inscribed in the Upper Clarity. When merit is complete and virtue perfected, one will ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Guard this secret, be cautious, and do not transmit it to the unworthy.

**The Five Sprouts True Writ**
The Master said: The Numinous Treasure possesses the Five Directions’ True Talismans of the Crimson Writ of Ancestral *Qi*, the Numinous Treasure of Heaven. Within the human body, they govern the inner growth of the five-colored numinous mushrooms and externally summon the cloud sprouts of the five directions to harmonize *qi*, which are the true fluids and true waters. In heaven, they are the Five Venerable Thearchs; in the scriptures, they coalesce *qi* into writ, known as the Five Sprouts True Writ. In the five directions, they are the Five Thearchs; in the celestial patterns, they are the Five Stars; in terrestrial principles, they are the Five Peaks; in affairs, they are the Five Constants; in things, they are the Five Phases; and within the human body, they are the Five Viscera. In practicing the Dao of the Numinous Treasure and the method of the Grotto Chamber, one ingests the life-*qi* of the Five Directions’ true and upright to refine the mortal body. How wondrous!

**The Green Sprout True Writ** – twelve characters
**The Crimson Sprout True Writ** – twelve characters

**The White Sprout True Writ** – twelve characters
**The Black Sprout True Writ** – twelve characters
**The Yellow Sprout True Writ** – sixteen characters

The Five *Qi* and Five Sprout True Writs above are to be inscribed in cinnabar upon two tablets of gold-lacquered black radiance, then employed in the practice of invoking *qi*. After completing the morning audience and reciting the Grotto Chapters internally, they may be put to use. The method requires facing the direction, knocking the teeth, and swallowing saliva thrice; the heart bows in three prostrations. Emit the true ascent upon the rainbow of a hundred flowers, where cinnabar-red spirits welcome you. With the tongue, lick and dissolve the five-colored darkness, swallowing it into the Double Towers, sending it to the Crimson Palace. There it transforms into brocade-like patterns of the Five Directions, interweaving into talismans. The Five Sprout primordial *qi* is the embryonic body of numinous fluid. This is the ancestral *qi* of the Numinous Treasure within the body—scholars ought to practice it diligently.

**Wearing the True Writs**
The Master said: The method of internal refinement with the Five Sprouts invokes the Five Thearchs and Five Numinous Ones to descend in truth, and by wearing the True Writs, their spirits reside within the Five Viscera to summon the essence of the Five Sprouts.

Regularly at the *Lichun* day’s cockcrow, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. Sit upright, knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the Eastern Azure Thearch, Numinous Might Spirit, who governs spring and presides over the east’s generative *qi*. His body is nine inches tall, crowned with azure jade, clad in nine-*qi* azure feathered robes. He rides a chariot drawn by green dragons, bearing a banner of *xu* and *hu*, accompanied by ninety myriad officials of *jia-yi* and Hu Elder, descending in an instant. They transform and generate azure *qi*, like clouds pouring over one’s body, entering through one’s mouth and descending directly into the Liver Palace. Next, visualize Jupiter blazing brightly in the east, illuminating one’s body. Open the mouth, recite the incantation nine times, draw in nine breaths of eastern *qi*, swallow saliva, and ingest the Eastern True Writ of twelve characters.

**Incantation:**
Nine *qi* of the Azure Heavens,
Primordial essence of the Highest Origin.
August Elder, Venerable Spirit,
Clad in feathered azure.
Enthroned in the Celestial Palace,
Jupiter shines resplendent.
Scattering radiance, streaming fragrance,
Irrigating my form.
Feasting on morning clouds above,
Ingesting the essence of wood.
Nurturing the Green Sprout,
Preserving and guarding decrepit years.
The Liver Palace brims full,
Jade mushrooms grow of themselves.
Reversing years through kalpas,
Complexion returns to youth.
Five *qi* harmonize and unite,
Heaven and earth merge as one.

Regularly at the *Lixia* day’s cockcrow, enter the chamber, face south, and bow three times. Sit upright, knock the teeth three times, and visualize the Southern Vermilion Thearch, Red Standard Slave, who governs summer and presides over the south’s generative *qi*. His body is three inches tall, crowned with vermilion jade, clad in three-*qi* crimson feathered robes. He rides a chariot drawn by cinnabar dragons, bearing a jade banner of *cai* and *xu*, accompanied by thirty myriad officials of *bing-ding* and Yue Elder, descending in an instant to illuminate one’s body. Next, visualize Mars blazing brightly in the south, illuminating one’s form. Open the eyes, recite the incantation three times, draw in three breaths of southern *qi*, swallow saliva, and ingest the Southern True Writ of twelve characters.

**Incantation:**
Three *qi* of the Cinnabar Heavens,
Vermilion Palace’s numinous youth.
Primordial Thearch of the Highest Origin,
Riding a chariot of crimson dragons.
Crimson feathers in flight,
Broidered robes of radiant light.
Driving the numinous officials,
Directing the Dao of yin and yang.
Three *qi* exhale brilliance,
Irrigating my Crimson Palace.
The Red Child is firmly settled,
Refining fragrance to adorn the visage.
Feasting on vermilion dawns,
Jade mushrooms fill to overflowing.
Reversing kalpas of years,
Decrepit frame returns to youth.
Longevity like heaven and earth,
Eternally enjoying boundless bliss.
Body generates water and fire,
Transforming in a hundred ways.

Always at the *liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn) day’s hour of the cock’s crow, face west and bow seven times. Sit upright, click the teeth seven times, and visualize the White Thearch of the West, Bai Zhaoju, who governs autumn and presides over the *qi* of generation in the west. His body stands seven inches tall, crowned with a white jade coronet, clad in a robe of sevenfold white *qi* and feathered raiment. He rides a jade chariot drawn by white dragons, bearing a plain banner, and is attended by seventy myriad officials of Geng-Xin and the Mysterious Elders. In an instant, they descend, transforming into white *qi* like clouds that suddenly envelop one’s body, entering through the mouth and descending straight into the Lung Palace.

Next, visualize the Metal Star blazing bright in the west, illuminating one’s body. Then open the eyes, recite the incantation seven times, draw in seven breaths of western *qi*, swallow saliva, and ingest the Western True Writ of twelve characters.

**Incantation:**
Seven gates of golden clouds,
Resplendent and luminous in the Western Flower.
Within abides the Plain Thearch,
The abode of the Primordial Origin.
Riding a chariot of white dragons,
Sevenfold *qi* towering and majestic.
Wandering the Jade Gate,
Scattering essence like crimson auroras.
The Metal Star exhales brilliance,
Fragrant mushrooms overflowing in abundance.
Mysterious profundity within my body,
Nurturing my plain sprout.
Luminous stone, radiant light,
Unfading through ten thousand kalpas.
Ingesting flowing springs,
Feasting on Grand Harmony.
The Supreme Thearch of the Nine Heavens bestows
Jade blossoms upon me.
Preserving years and halting whitening,
A visage of flourishing splendor.
Abiding as long as heaven and earth,
In harmony with the Three Luminaries.
Always at the *lidong* (Beginning of Winter) day’s hour of the cock’s crow, enter the chamber, face north, and bow five times. Sit upright, click the teeth five times, and visualize the Black Thearch of the North, Xu Guangji, who governs winter and presides over the *qi* of generation in the north. His body stands five inches tall, crowned with a dark jade coronet, clad in a robe of fivefold dark *qi* and feathered raiment. He rides a jade chariot drawn by black dragons, bearing a black banner, and is attended by fifty myriad officials of Ren-Gui and the Qiang Elders. In a moment, they descend, generating black *qi* like clouds, resembling the light of shooting stars that envelop one’s body, entering through the mouth and descending straight into the Kidney Palace.

Next, visualize the Water Star blazing bright in the north, illuminating one’s body. Then open the eyes, recite the incantation five times, draw in five breaths of northern *qi*, swallow saliva, and ingest the Northern True Writ of twelve characters.

**Incantation:**
Northern Mysterious Heaven,
Fivefold *qi* scattering numinosity.
Primordial essence—
Riding dragons, bearing banners,
Roaming and feasting in the Jade Capital.
This day is supremely auspicious,
Auspicious clouds spread glory.
Flying mushrooms stream and scatter,
Overflowing in all four directions.
Jade maidens of mysterious profundity,
Blending with my bodily form.
The Kidney Palace is firmly settled,
Withered sprouts grow firm and flourish.
The Five Palaces receive the true,
Communing upward with the divine.
The Five Elders descend to welcome,
The Dao of immortality swiftly achieved.
Transforming water and fire,
Clad in feathered robes of azure.
Soaring through the great void,
Wandering to the Purple Court.
Lifespan equal to the Three Luminaries,
Eternal through ten thousand kalpas.

Always at the hours of the cock’s crow on the days of the spring equinox, autumn equinox, summer solstice, and winter solstice, enter the chamber and face the flourishing direction of the five quarters. Bow twelve times with the heart, sit upright, and click the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Yellow Thearch of the Center, Han Shuniu, who presides over the flourishing *qi* of the five directions. His body stands one foot and two inches tall, crowned with a yellow jade coronet, clad in five-colored robes, riding a jade chariot drawn by yellow dragons, bearing a yellow banner, and attended by twelve myriad officials of Wu-Ji and the Azure Dragon. In an instant, they descend, transforming into yellow *qi* like clouds that envelop one’s body, entering through the mouth and descending straight into the Spleen Palace.

Next, visualize the Earth Star shining at the center, illuminating one’s body. Then close the eyes, recite the incantation twelve times, draw in twelve breaths of central *qi*, swallow saliva, and ingest the Central True Writ of sixteen characters.

**Incantation:**
Central Mount Tai,
Primordial *qi* wandering and lingering.
Above abides the Mysterious Elder,
Governing the Four Numinous Ones.
Riding a chariot of yellow elders,
Clad in five-colored feathered robes.
Directing the Dao through the Nine Heavens,
Revolving and roaming the turning jade.
Radiant and bright as the Seven Stars,
Streaming light and scattering brilliance.
Jade blossoms and fragrant mushrooms,
Overflowing and flying in all four directions.
Irrigating my body,
The Spleen Palace shines and opens.
Nurturing sprouts and feasting on essence,
The myriad spirits all return.
Restraining the hun and controlling the po,
Refining the Eight Powers of immortality.
Within and without, thoroughly purified,
Ever-living and unaging.
Communing with the true and reaching the numinous,
Ascending into the Grand Tenuity.

**Method for Ingesting the Cloud-Liquid of Numinous Mushrooms**
The Master said: In spring and summer, first ingest the cloud-liquid, then the primordial *qi*. In autumn and winter, first ingest the primordial *qi*, then the cloud-liquid.

For regular practice, at the hour of the cock’s crow when yang light first divides, face the southeast, and click the teeth according to the number of each direction: nine for the east, three for the south, seven for the west, five for the north, and twelve for the center. Rub the palms together until warm, then wipe the face and eyes. Recite the incantation according to the number of each direction, beginning from the east and circling once. Then sequentially drink and ingest the true liquid of the Five Sprouts.

The Five Sprouts are as follows:

**Eastern Green Sprout:**
Green sprout of the east,
Purple clouds streaming auroras.
Ingest the green sprout,
Drinking the dawn’s blossom.
The green sprout is the liver; the dawn’s blossom is the root of the upper teeth.
Use the tongue to stroke the inside of the upper teeth, lick the lips three times, rinse the mouth until the Jade Spring fills it, and swallow nine times. Then draw in nine breaths of green *qi* to settle within the liver.

**Southern Vermilion Cinnabar:**
Vermilion cinnabar, radiant and wandering.
Ingest the vermilion cinnabar,
Drinking from the Cinnabar Pool.
The vermilion cinnabar is the heart; the Cinnabar Pool is the root of the lower teeth.
Use the tongue to stir the inside of the lower teeth, lick the lips three times, rinse the mouth until the Jade Mushroom fills it, and swallow three times. Then draw in three breaths of red *qi* to settle within the heart.

**Western Luminous Stone:**
Luminous stone of the west,
Resplendent and complete in numinous essence.
Ingest the luminous stone,
Drinking the numinous liquid.
The luminous stone is the lung; the numinous liquid is the essence of the lips’ exterior.
Use the tongue to stroke the outside of the upper teeth, lick the lips three times, rinse the mouth until the Jade Mushroom fills the river, and swallow seven times. Then draw in seven breaths of white *qi* to settle within the lung.

**Northern Mysterious Nourishment:**
Mysterious nourishment of the north,
Dark pearls moistening and enriching.
Ingest the mysterious nourishment,
Drinking the Jade Syrup.
The mysterious nourishment is the kidney; the Jade Syrup is the tongue.
Use the tongue to stroke the inside of the lower teeth, lick the lips three times, rinse the mouth until the Jade Mushroom fills it, inhale and exhale, then swallow five times.

Then draw in five breaths of black *qi* through the nose and swallow them to settle within the kidney.

**Central Mysterious Nourishment of Wu-Earth and Ji-Earth:**
Lofty and towering, the Great Mount,
Ingesting *qi* to guard essence,
Drinking the Sweet Spring.
One name is Jade Bloom, another Golden Root,
Or gazing upward at the Great Mount.
Wu-Earth and Ji-Earth are the spleen; the Great Mount is the forehead.
Use the tongue to stroke the inside and outside of the upper and lower teeth, lick the lips three times, rinse the mouth until the Jade Spring fills it, and swallow twelve times. Then draw in twelve breaths of yellow *qi* to settle within the spleen.

When this is complete, knock the teeth thirty-six times, swallow *qi* thirty-five times, and recite the unifying incantation. The incantation says:
*"White jade flows in succession,
The source spring surges like jade syrup.
Drink it to attain long life,
And extend your lifespan."*
After reciting the incantation, use the tongue to stroke the center of the upper and lower teeth, allowing the Jade Mushroom to fill the mouth, and swallow three times. Draw in *qi* twenty-five times, swallowing it to the fullest extent, and the Dao is complete.

This method is practiced at midnight (*zi* hour) and dawn (*yin* hour). At other times—*mao*, *you*, *wu*, *shen*, *si*, *hai*, and the four earthly branches—only ingest one *Lingya* Jade Liquid.

**Method for Ingesting Primordial *Qi*:**
Whenever ingesting primordial *qi*, close the mouth.
Curl the tongue, draw in *qi* through the nose until the mouth is full, then puff the cheeks and swallow.
At midnight: eighty-one swallows.
At dawn: sixty-four swallows.
At mealtime: forty-nine swallows.
At noon: thirty-six swallows.
At dusk: twenty-five swallows.
At twilight: sixteen swallows.
At other times: twenty-four swallows.
Practicing this method for a hundred days can transform the bones and alter one’s form. After a year, natural clarity of vision returns, aging is reversed, and one may ascend on clouds to become an immortal, awaiting with ease.

After ingesting *qi* and swallowing saliva at each appointed time, write the *Yuying* Spirit-Transformation Talisman nine times on bamboo membrane with cinnabar, swallow it with saliva, and visualize one’s spirit as an infant within the cinnabar field. After two years, it resides in the heart; after three years, in the *Niwan* palace. Practice this alongside the previous internal audience method.

After three years, one may divide their form at will, with boundless subtle wonders and limitless adaptability. The natural *qi* and fluids will follow and circulate accordingly. Beyond three years, fire responds and water attends, aligning with heaven and earth in yin and yang, and with the sun and moon in creation. After nine years, the Five Elders descend to welcome the adept’s ascent to heaven in broad daylight.

The Master says: Within heaven and earth, the sage attains the Dao, the worthy attains its methods, and the wise attain its protection—all through the convergence of heaven and earth’s essence to perfect their truth. Thus, the Dao cannot be sought through words, its methods cannot be sought through emotion, nor its protection through intent. All things follow heaven and earth’s transformations to return to spontaneity.

*Water-Fire Diagram*
*Yuying Spirit-Transformation Talisman*
*Yuying Taiyi Embryonic Transformation Heavenly Worthy*
*Mystic Primordial Qi Three Treasures Heavenly Lords*
*Qian Spirit Kun Reptile Qian Spirit Kun Mother*
*Vacuous Sovereign’s Decree: Jade Embryo Divides Form*
*Nine Qi Illuminate and Merge to Generate Life*
*Nine Heavens’ Primordial Qi Nurtures the Embryo to Perfection*
*Heaven One, Earth Pure, Humanity at Peace—Valley Sound Pierces the Nine Heavens to Reveal the True Form*
*Yang Hun Gathers Spirit, Seven Po Return to the Palace*
*Ascend to the Three Heavens, Descend to the Nine Springs*
*Matters Concluded, Return to the Origin—All Become Seven Virtues*
*Hasten as the Taiyi Heavenly Worthy Commands!*

*Illuminating the Three Luminaries*
The Master says: The Numinous Treasure contains the method of *Illuminating the Three Luminaries*. At sunrise, the adept should calm their heart, face the sun, and recite the *Yuyi* incantation:

Incantation:
*"Sun soul, vermilion radiance,
Shining unity veiled in emerald light."*

Vermilion Lads Returning Radiance, Dark Flame Whirlwind Manifests.
Upon completing the incantation, draw the sun’s purple rays through the nose, swallowing eighty-one times.

At moonrise, calm the heart, face the moon, and recite the *Jielin* incantation:

Incantation:
*"Moon soul, misty and vast,
Fragrant splendor veiled in desolation.
Gentle void, numinous orchid,
Lush blossoms entwine and rise.
Pure gold, limpid and bright,
Fiery countenance, towering and radiant."*

Upon completion, draw the moon’s yellow-hued *qi* through the nose, swallowing one hundred twenty times.

At the first night’s *xu*-end hour, gaze upward toward the Dipper’s pivot and recite the Northern Dipper’s secret name:
*[Seven characters obscured.]*
Upon completion, draw the Northern Dipper’s seven stars’ golden light through the mouth, swallowing forty-nine times.

Next, ingest the *Zhongyuan Three Luminaries Primordial Illumination True Talisman*, inscribed in cinnabar on bamboo membrane, forming nine strokes, and swallow with saliva.
Ingesting the solar talisman is forbidden after noon; the lunar talisman is forbidden before the first quarter and after the last quarter; the Dipper talisman is forbidden on *chen* and *xu* days.

By ingesting these Three Luminaries’ true *qi*, one may return essence to restore the embryo, immediately reverse aging to regain youth, exhale and blow away myriad illnesses at will, and cure them. All demons bow in submission, jade maidens attend the body. Without awaiting ascension, after three years of practice, one receives the scripture and becomes a *Three Luminaries Perfected*.

**Zhongyuan Three Luminaries Mystic Illumination True Talisman**
The Master says: The Three Luminaries Talismans are the true *qi* of the Three Lights, the orthodox Dao of Supreme Clarity. All are inscribed in cinnabar on yellow paper.
Men ingest the *Yuyi* Talisman; women ingest the *Jielin* Talisman. Those afflicted by malevolent spirits take the *Zhongyuan* Dipper form. In critical conditions, combine the three talismans into one and swallow; immediately, metal generates form, flesh is restored, complexion renewed, and bones transformed. With prolonged ingestion, one attains longevity and may also ascend in flight.

**Yuyi Talisman**
Visualize a square-round form with nine rays of purple light.
Left: nine coils of the sun soul’s vermilion radiance, *Li* *qi* at the upper joint of the middle finger.

**Jielin Talisman**
Visualize a square-round form with ten rays of white light.
Right: ten coils of the moon soul’s misty vastness, *Qian* *qi* at the upper joint of the fourth finger.

**Zhongyuan Dipper Form**
*[Seven characters obscured.]* From *xu* to *chen*, trace the governing luminaries; winter solstice at *xu*, summer solstice at *hai*.

**Combined Form**
The Greater Yang and Greater Yin, along with detailed stellar calculations, follow the days’ progression as recorded in the almanac.

**Refining and Ingesting the Three Luminaries**

The Master said: At sunrise, form the Jade Emperor mudra with both hands, join palms, and face the sun while reciting the Solar Lord Incantation:

*Incantation:*
Spirit of Yuyi, true essence of the *Li* Palace.
Irrigate and ingest the nine rays—*Qian*’s origin, upright and flourishing.

After reciting, inhale *qi* through the nose nine times, swallowing and directing it with intent to the Cinnabar Prime, repeating two nines, three nines, up to nine nines—eighty-one cycles. Then pray:

*Oṃ yu-pan-li yu zhen-yuan hui.*
*Vajra-[...]-ra-yung-[...]-li svāhā.*

After reciting, ingest *qi* as before.

At moonrise, form the Jade Emperor mudra with both hands, join palms, and face the moon while reciting the Lunar Lady Incantation:

*Incantation:*
Lady Jielin, true essence of the *Kan* position.
Round radiance of eight rays—auspicious, primal, and prosperous.

After reciting, inhale *qi* through the nose eight times, swallowing and directing it with intent to the Cinnabar Prime, repeating eight eights—sixty-four cycles. Then recite:

*Oṃ jie-heng-[...]-heng-[...]-lang.*
*Vajra ming-ra-[...]-ra svāhā.*

After reciting, ingest *qi* as before. Perform this only from the ninth day after the waxing crescent to the sixteenth or seventeenth day after the waning crescent.

At starlight, form the Jade Emperor mudra with both hands, join palms, and face the direction of the Celestial Pivot while reciting the Celestial Pivot Incantation:

*Incantation:*
*Oṃ* spirit of the Dipper, true essence of the Northern Culmen.
Flowing radiance of seven rays—*hūṃ*, roaring, congealing power.

After reciting, inhale *qi* through the nose seven times, swallowing and directing it with intent to the Cinnabar Prime, repeating seven sevens—forty-nine cycles. Then recite:

*Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ mi-li nu-na po-lo xiu-li ti-cha-li hūṃ.*

After reciting, ingest *qi* as before. Perform this only during the *xu* and *hai* hours; at other times, do not practice. This method refines the Three Luminaries into form. On overcast or rainy days, it cannot be performed.

Upon completing the ingestion of the Three Luminaries, strike the teeth nine times and withdraw.

**Ingesting the Three Luminaries Talisman**

The Master said: On every third seventh day, form the Dipper mudra with both hands, face the Heavenly Gate, pace the Northern Dipper’s *qi* path, turn to face south, and ingest the Three Luminaries Talisman. Recite the Three Secret Names of the Supreme Emperor:

*Mysterious Concealed Qi, Heaven’s Mandate Endures, Mortals Ever Peaceful.*

After reciting, bow twice, swallow the talisman with fresh water, bow again, and recite the General Incantation:

*Incantation:*
Ancestral Dao, Mysterious True, resplendent and majestic divine.
Yuyi restores essence; Mars commands form.
Vermilion brightness harmonizes Yang—governing, prohibiting, mighty spirit.
Radiant luminaries, ancestral soaring—Emperor’s doubled brilliance.
*Wu-Ji*’s flourishing glory, Central Star’s guardian.
Sweep away perverse *qi*, shatter and dissolve wanton essence.
Seas encountering it boil; metals, melt.
Woods, reduced to ash; fires, extinguished to void.
Lord of the Eternal *Li*, commanding and seizing flying traces.
*Mi-li nu-na, oṃ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ.*
Azure Youth of the Eastern Sea, encompassing and deploying nets.
*Mi-li nu-na, oṃ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ.*

After reciting, visualize the *qi* of the Three Luminaries irrigating the Three Fields. This incantation is also used for the Nine Talismans.

Heaven   Earth   Human
*Command Longevity*
*Ho* holds the mirrorless, grasping posture and bearing.

Ancestral Dao, Mysterious True, eternally resplendent divine.
Emperor governs the Highest True; Mars commands conduct.

*Crown and sash of nine hempen rays.*

When inscribing this talisman, face northeast and recite the Three Luminaries’ One-Syllable Incantation: *Yu-Li-Zhen*, three times. Inhale *qi* three times, channeling it into the brush to write. Then recite:

*Incantation:*
Spirit of Yuyi, true essence of the *Li* Palace.
Irrigate and ingest the nine rays—*Qian*’s origin, upright and flourishing.

Visualize within a nine-rayed purple light, a round radiance youth like the rising sun, wheel-shaped. Silently recite the Three-Syllable Incantation nine times, gathering *qi* into the Cinnabar Field, then ascending from the Cinnabar Field to blow and spread it into the talisman, where purple light entwines upon it.

Essence   *Qi*   Spirit
*Command Longevity*
Vermilion brightness harmonizes Yang—governing, prohibiting, mighty spirit.

*Primal aperture ascends; Wu-Ji’s flourishing glory.*
*Sa-lo-lou King, seizing souls and restraining spirits.*

When inscribing this talisman, face northeast and recite the Three-Syllable Incantation: *Jie-Heng-Kan*, three times. Inhale *qi* twice, channeling it into the brush to write. Then recite:

Lady Jielin, true essence of the *Kan* position.
Round radiance of eight rays—auspicious, primal, and prosperous.

Void’s origin, upright and mysterious—luminaries’ radiant ancestral soaring.

Purple revolving pole, spinning—Emperor’s motion, Highest Mystery.
Emperor summons true youths, nurturing ninefold prosperity.
Overseeing luminous Brahma, Heaven’s vault.
Mighty governing Heaven’s decrees, floating nets uniting spirits.

When inscribing this talisman, face the *qi* direction of the Celestial Pivot and recite the Three-Syllable Incantation: *Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ*, three times. Inhale *qi* three times, channeling it into the brush to write, reciting the *Command of the Utmost Mystery’s True General Venerable Title*. Then recite:

*Incantation:*
*Oṃ* spirit of the Dipper, true essence of the Northern Culmen.
Flowing radiance of seven rays—*hūṃ*, roaring, congealing power.

**Jade Tone’s Qi-Seizing Numinous Writ**

Ancestral Dao, Mysterious True, majestic and resplendent divine.
Yuyi restores essence; Mars commands form.
Vermilion brightness harmonizes Yang—governing, prohibiting, mighty spirit.
Radiant luminaries, ancestral soaring—Emperor’s doubled brilliance.
*Wu-Ji*’s flourishing glory, Central Star’s guardian.
Sweep away perverse darkness, shatter and dissolve wanton essence.
Seas encountering it boil; metals, melt.
Woods, reduced to ash; fires, extinguished to void.
Lord of the Eternal *Li*, commanding and seizing flying traces.

**Jade Tone’s Qi-Seizing Numinous Writ (continued)**

Mired in confusion, *nuna* weeps and wails.
The Azure Youth of the Eastern Sea spreads his net wide.
Mired in confusion, *nuna*—*om*, *om*, *hum*, *hum*.

The Master says: At sunrise, face the sun. First visualize the five viscera clearly, then silently recite the numinous verses of the Jade Tone. Seize *qi* and blow it once, then turn your mouth toward the sunlight and resist swallowing nine times. Recite the verses again, close your eyes, and draw a long breath through the nose, silently counting nine swallows. Visualize the sun’s nine rays of purple light descending into the cinnabar field, taking the form of the sun. The more repetitions performed before noon, the greater the merit—this practice must not be done after noon.

Until the third night, when the moon first appears, follow the method for drawing lunar *qi*: close your eyes, inhale through the nose, and swallow ten times. Visualize the moon’s ten rays of white light descending into the cinnabar field, where it merges halfway with the sun’s form. After the twenty-third day, do not draw it again.

Lunar *qi* is equal to solar *qi*, totaling ten thousand repetitions. In spring, first draw the virtue of Wood; in summer, the virtue of Fire; in autumn, the virtue of Metal; in winter, the virtue of Water. During the four seasons’ earthly ascendance, draw the *qi* of each direction’s color, also totaling ten thousand repetitions.

Every five days in a month, follow the method of the Cavernous Chapters to draw the purple *qi* from the Dipper ten thousand times—this is called the "Outer Attendant’s Eight-Jewel Elixir." At one thousand repetitions, divine light appears and vanishes in the night moon. At two thousand, the body radiates light. At three thousand, the entire chamber is illuminated. At four thousand, old ailments, new illnesses, scars, and lingering roots all vanish, and one’s complexion reverts to that of an infant. At five thousand, the Earth Bureau erases one’s name from the register of death, and the Jade Clarity records one as a student of the Dao, with a hundred spirits in attendance. At six thousand, the entire body shines with penetrating light, allowing fine script to be read at night from a hundred paces; ghosts and spirits cannot hide, and the future is foreknown. At seven thousand, breath can revive the dead. At eight thousand, exhaled commands transform the Five Metals into supreme treasures, their light forming perfect spheres. At nine thousand, the elixir matures like the sun, the face takes on a golden countenance, the bones exude five fragrances, and the Three Heavens register one as an immortal. At ten thousand, the Dao is perfected, and one ascends as a Perfected Person.

**Inner Audience at the Three Heavens’ Golden Palaces: Invoking Perfected Ones and Summoning Spirits**

The Master says: The great method encompasses the Dao of invoking Perfected Ones and summoning spirits, the subtleties of *qi*-induced generation and transformation, and the transformations of Perfected and numinous beings ascending and descending. Through breath and seated practice, one commands the service of countless Perfected Immortals, with nothing beyond reach. First, one transforms the inner self, then directs the myriad realms, moving in harmony with nature, illuminating the Three Luminaries. The great circulation of Brahmanic *qi* pervades the ten directions, forging the mysterious and entering the wondrous—truly, this is the boundless expanse above the Great Veil, the Dao of the Ten Revolutions of Returning Spirit.

To seek this Dao externally is like climbing a tree to catch a fish—vainly expending spirit and *qi*. Those who study immortality must refine within and temper without, aiding the manifest and delivering the hidden, beginning with this practice. One must petition for descent, conducting an inner audience at the Three Luminaries’ celestial palaces, flying to the Perfected to pay homage to the Emperor—this is the functional application of uniting spirit with the Dao.

For the sake of state and people, to pray for blessings and dispel misfortune, to refine and transform yin souls, to perform the great *Huanglu* fast, to present memorials and submit petitions, to register and beseech divine favor—one must inwardly recite the mysterious repayment, lest one fall from the great affinity.

The method of application: After bathing and entering the oratory, regulate spirit and rectify *qi*, whether sitting or kneeling. First, refine the Six Palaces within, then open the Eight Gates above, circulate the Three Palaces in the center, and connect below to the inner portals. Order the Five *Qi*, harmonizing the hundred spirits. Next, ascend the rainbow’s golden bridge to reach the Dipper within the Central Heaven. From the Central Heaven, ascend the bridge directly to the Three Heavens, or pay homage to the Three Treasures and the Nine Heavens’ Celestial Emperor. The Three Officials, Five Masters, Grand Unity, and Southern Culmen’s Venerable Master—all employ this method to manifest the mysterious repayment.

The Dao of the Numinous Treasure primarily relies on refining and reciting with spirit and *qi* to pay homage, enabling the adept to rank among the immortal officials and attend the Perfected in the Golden Palace. If recklessly misapplied, it will merely mislead the living and the dead, shorten one’s lifespan, and incur punishment. The mysterious statutes are fixed, and violating the prohibitions invites transmission.

The method states: Circulate the Perfected from the Cinnabar Palace to the Crimson Palace, then ascend to the Hall of Light, gazing upward at the Three Heavens. Ascend and transform, beginning with the Eastern Qingwei Heaven, and present the memorial according to the method, returning to the myriad spirits. First, silently recite the *Secret Chapters of the Jade Clarity’s Descent of the Perfected and Audience at the Origin*, then ingest the true talismans of the Three Heavens and Three Realms. Next, recite the *Secret Chapters of the Inner Audience at the Golden Palace*.

**Secret Chapters of the Jade Clarity’s Descent of the Perfected and Audience at the Origin**
The talismans of the Supreme Clarity summon the myriad spirits.
Numinous light illuminates universally, the Three Realms are pervaded with clarity.
The jade talismans descend in flight, harmonizing with the imperial court.
Your servant now petitions, ascending to the Jade Clarity.
Clouds and mist ascend in flight, ceaselessly, moment by moment.
Directly ascending the Jade Palace, merging with the Dao.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Jade Clarity’s Supreme Emperor decrees!*

The *Ten Heavens’ Formula* emerges from the Supreme Clarity, circulating and transforming to invoke the Perfected and summon the Numinous Treasure talismans. Flying smoke scatters like brocade, penetrating the Three Heavens above and below, forming a seven-jeweled golden tower and jade hall, resplendently arrayed and reflected before one’s eyes. Again, from the Three Palaces, issue the Jade Clarity’s formula. In the censer, the myriad hosts descend together.

**Secret Chapters of the Inner Audience at the Three Heavens’ Golden Palace**
The Supreme Unity of the Upper Origin guards the Muddy Pellet.
The Director of Destinies of the Middle Origin sits securely in the Crimson Palace.
The Peach and Health of the Lower Origin, in the Palace of Life, hold the registers.
The Noble Youth of Primordial Brilliance, the Venerable White Prime.
At the first recitation of the jade verses, the myriad spirits attend in welcome.
The ancestral *qi* of the Jade Clarity merges with the Dao and becomes true.
The Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy descends the Dao and flies the spirit.
Ascending and transforming, subtly penetrating, directly paying homage to the Jade Emperor’s court.
The left and right attendants and guards stride into the imperial court.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Jade Clarity’s Supreme Emperor decrees!*

After reciting the secret incantation, swallow saliva three times. From both armpits, emit and circulate spirit to unite with the Dao. Golden light bursts forth from the two palaces, infusing the talismans of the Three Realms. With the tongue, guide the gaze to receive *qi* and ingest the talismans.

**Ingesting the Talismans of the Three Realms**
The spirit and *qi* are pure, ascending to receive the Three Clarities.
The Six Dings and Six Jias wield merciless swords of authority.

The Great Dao is spontaneous, delivering and ferrying all beings.
The jade talismans infuse the brush, paying homage to the Perfected.
A thousand evils lie hidden, ten thousand demons shatter their forms.
Fire bells and celestial stems, White Beasts and Golden Essences.
Circulating in guard, valiantly presiding over the Three Clarities.
The Jade Talismans of the Supreme Emperor descend to pacify the body.
Wicked demons and treacherous fiends—where the Dao’s *qi* abides, they endure no longer.
Transforming and ascending, ascending to the imperial court.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Primordial Supreme Emperor decrees!*

Form the Ten Heavens mudra with both hands, blow and disperse the ancestral *qi*, roll the talisman with the tongue, moisten with saliva, and swallow. Soaring and transforming, ascend through the thirty-two heavens; upon descending the seat, receive the Perfected.
**Incantation for Receiving the Perfected**
Heavenly spirits of the Nine Palaces, Great One guards the chamber.
A hundred spirits assume their stations, soul and spirit secure in well-being.
Long life and enduring vision, radiant as the sun and moon.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Supreme Emperor’s statutes and decrees command!*

This incantation was proclaimed by the Golden Mouth; the August One inscribed it to transmit to the humble. One must follow its instructions in practice to seek the mysterious reward. If one cultivates and petitions on one’s own, the hundred spirits merge in harmony, illuminating the ten directions. No calamities shall approach, and divine luminaries shall guard the gate.

You should refine your conduct to summon the Perfected and ascend the Dao. When practicing, first form the Jade Clarity mudra with the right hand and the Five Peaks mudra with the left.
Red apricot, black ink of *mao*, true grind of *wu*, intestines of *you*, Numinous Treasure of *zi*. The Chinese responds to transformation.

Silently recite three times, then expel the five directions’ blackness—do not release *qi*, but press it down with the *qi* of the five directions. If one’s learning lacks sincerity, the Five Peaks will test the practitioner. Be cautious, be cautious.

**Green Emperor’s Talisman for Guarding the Hun-Soul**
**Incantation:**
Master of the Five Phases, Celestial Controller of the Nine Heavens.
Verdant Yang’s creation, resplendent and radiant.
Flying clouds form the script, wind-horses soar in obedience.
Mists and vapors waft auspiciously, nurturing the Yang spring.
Wood Palace’s great kindness, guarding and protecting the liver’s *hun*.
This talisman shields the three *hun* of those who attain the Dao, enabling their spiritual communion and clarity.

**Incantation:**
Reverently summon the liver as the Azure Palace’s Lord of Non-Being, Ruler of the *Hun*, essence of Lesser Yang and Wood, the reverse of Jupiter’s star. Receive and transform it within the body to generate the liver. The three *hun* reside therein, with nine wood spirits and nine thousand divine officials. Swiftly descend true *qi* to nourish and defend the skin, governing every hair.

**Incantation for Treating Liver Ailments Where the *Hun* Does Not Attach to the Body**
The Green Emperor guards the *hun*, securing and presiding over the Three Palaces.
Inscribe in green on yellow paper, with *zhen* script, eastern *qi*. Swallow and wear it; avoid sour and pungent flavors for nine days.

On the day of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring), receive this. If to be swallowed, inscribe upon three sheets of bamboo membrane. If to be worn, inscribe upon white silk.

**Hymn of the Azure Emperor’s Talisman**
Facing east, bow twice with hands clasped:
Azure Emperor, Jade Sovereign Lord.
Divine winds stir the sacred keys,
Nurturing all things in primal spring.
Cloud-dragons harness the solemn chariot,
Jade guards escort the jasper wheel.
Withered sprouts awash in bounty,
Great kindness spreads without exception.
Myriad immortals chant the Dao,
In intricate counsel admonishing gods and men.
The root of the heart, deluded, clings fast—
Yet all bow beneath vast benevolence.

**Talisman of the Vermilion Emperor for Nurturing *Qi***

**Incantation:**
Five *qi* revolve and traverse,
All lungs interpenetrate.
The sun moves the dark pearl,
Light courses through the radiant peak.
The Three Palaces ascend and descend,
Endlessly circulating.
Resplendent solar essence,
Giving rise to the ten thousand things.
The Purple Chamber merges as one,
Nine *hun* refined to purity.
Clad in vermilion, cinnabar begins;
Xiaoren’s terrace commences.
Flowing through blood and *qi*,
Returning to the womb’s fiery court.

This talisman governs fire and nurtures primordial *qi*.
The Yellow Emperor said: “Raging fire consumes, gentle fire generates *qi*; warmth must come first for nurturance.”

**Incantation:**
Reverently summon the heart as the Crimson Palace’s Supreme Unity, Controller of Destiny, essence of Greater Yang and Fire, the *qi* of Mars. Receive and transform it within the body to generate the left heart. To its left dwells the Jade Youth, to its right the Jade Maiden; three fire spirits and three thousand attending officials reside therein, governing its domain, nourishing and defending the palaces and organs, presiding over *hun* and *po*.

**Incantation for Treating Heart Ailments Where *Qi* is Insufficient**
The Vermilion Emperor nurtures *qi*,
All spirits return to the body.

Inscribe in vermilion on black paper, with *wu* script, southern *qi*. Swallow and wear it; avoid bitter flavors for three days, and recovery will follow.

On the day of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer), receive this. If to be swallowed, inscribe upon two sheets of bamboo membrane. If to be worn, inscribe upon yellow silk.

The cavernous hall opens its golden eaves.

**Talisman of the White Emperor for Attending the *Po***

**The Illuminating Perfected of Subtle Mystery, Savior from Suffering, Master Xiao Quan-Zhen, Transmits to the Disciples of the Three Caverns of Highest Clarity and the Numinous Treasure Lineage, Master Wang Qi-Zhen, Compiler**

**Gate of Cultivation, Wearing, and Ingestion**
**Eighty-One Chapters of the Mysterious Secret Essence: Returning to the Origin and Revering the Supreme Arcana**

For all who study immortality and seek the Daoist arts: if the spirit does not return to its root, it will not be numinous; if *qi* does not return to its origin, there will be no treasure. The method possesses the *qi* of the Five Talismans and Five Numinous Ones, which can purge the five viscera of filth and turbidity, purifying body and mind. Thereafter, meditate upon the Dao and contemplate the True—naturally, awakening will arise, and divine transformations will be unfathomable.

One should distance oneself from sensual distractions, uphold loyalty and filial piety within the household, and aid beings for the benefit of others. The method employs Five Talismans, inscribed in vermilion upon five squares of colored silk, each half an inch in size. At dawn, enter the oratory, burn incense, and ingest the *qi* of the Five Numinous Talismans, mixed with well-flower water, facing the five directions. After seven days of ingestion, one may freely summon the Eighty-One Heavenly Officers and employ the Eighty-One Chapters of Universal Salvation. Submit flying memorials to the Emperor, deliver all wandering souls, and by this method, transcend the ghosts of the Nine Provinces. Whether praying for rain or seeking clear skies, healing the sick or expelling demons, none shall fail to respond.

**Five Numinous True Talismans**
*Red Apricot, Ink Black, Grind the True, Stocking Wax, Numinous Treasure*

**General Incantation:**
Nine Radiances, Three *Qi*,
Seven Governors, Five Constants.
The August Central Sovereign,
Descends to the Primordial Yang.

**Eighty-One Chapters, General Invocation:**
First, approach the seat of the Eight Assemblies and Nine Radiances.
Naturally, the script forms—
the myriad spirits all conceal themselves.

Visualize within the cinnabar field a chaotic brilliance of nine lights, shimmering and soaring, returning to the root of life. After a long while, ascend to the Eight Effulgences; *qi* enters the Profound Mystery, and within the Mystery, the Supreme August One welcomes the assembly of the myriad perfected. As thoughts arise, prayers are answered, and all spirits are universally summoned.

The foregoing all derive from the *Central Void of the Numinous Treasure*. In all practices, visualize the primordial qi of the Original Beginning, recite the Eighty-One Character [Incantation] in the heart, then apply the talismans as needed.

The Dao’s arcane and recondite purport is the root of the myriad methods. To attain it, one must be devoted to *guarding the One*; to enact it, one must rely on *spiritual efficacy*. When spiritual efficacy is fully realized, there is nothing it cannot accomplish. Guarding the spirit, the spirit becomes numinous; qi gathers, treasures abound. When spirit and qi are stabilized, inner and outer radiance shines, responses are unimpeded, and one attains the celestial perfected. Within the perfected dwells the spirit—*the Great Lord of Longevity*. When the perfected and the spirit resonate, one ascends to the imperial court, one’s name is inscribed in the jade registers, and for ten thousand kalpas, one enjoys felicity and glory.

To know this and advance in the Dao is to have the wondrous principle spontaneously illumined. To know this and grow remiss is to have one’s form extinguished for all generations. To treat it lightly, to leak or slight it, is to bring punishment upon the seven ancestors. Beware, beware—the celestial statutes are not lenient.
