**Divine Tiger Mysterious Range Gate**
**Summoning Generals and Ritual Procedures**

The Master says: For all summoning and dispatching rites, one must first cultivate inner refinement. Only then may one visualize the spirits, clasp the mudras, pace the Dipper, and gather the numina. Whether inscribing jade tablets with talismanic commands, issuing jade decrees, establishing the Yin and Yang altars, or summoning and capturing the souls of the deceased, one must first perform these preparations. Through such adaptability, efficacy may be achieved.

The method states: At the outset of summoning generals, first perform the standard purification of heart, mouth, and body. Next, visualize the body as withered wood. With the left and right hands forming the *Jade Clarity Mudra*, ignite the heart’s fire to blaze fiercely, reducing the wood to ashes. The left hand traces the *Wu* (Fire) trigram, the right the *Zi* (Water) trigram. Cross the hands at the waist, visualizing the true fire within the kidneys rotating like a wheel, merging with the heart’s fire. Invoke the *Xun* (Wind) to blow the ashes away entirely. Strike the teeth twelve times, face the Celestial Gate, and inhale the Primordial Ancestral *Qi* twelve times, holding the breath for a short while.

Visualize the Celestial Gate descending with purple clouds into the crown of the head. Envision the Central Palace emitting yellow and white energies that intertwine and merge with the purple clouds. Imagine oneself as the *Primordial Beginning*, then visualize the *Great One* descending from the void to stand before you, seated upon a nine-headed lion throne. Inhale the *Azure Mystery Qi* from the *Great One’s* crown, uniting it with the *Primordial Beginning’s* *qi*, transforming it into a radiant canopy of a hundred treasures enveloping the body. Visualize the Celestial Gate suffused with purple clouds and azure mists, from which emerge divine officials, tiger-nobles, jade maidens, and talismanic scribes, all bearing staffs and holding talismans.

Then, brush the sleeves and flick the fingers behind the ears and eyes. Complete the visualization, advance, burn incense, and strike the teeth twelve times. Press the tongue to the upper palate, circulate the *Flowery Pond* twice, then guide the lung’s *wu* (void) to pace the *Divine Tiger’s* tracks and the *Spiritual Vigor* of the Dipper, taking thirteen *Ding* steps. Cross the little and ring fingers, press the thumbs together against the middle phalanges of the middle fingers, and recite the *Secret Incantation of the Whistling Mandate for the Spirit Vigor*:

**Incantation:**
*Mysterious Range, Northern Chief,*
*Grasping life and death’s supreme Way,*
*Breath and root flourish my path.*
*Jade Tablet, Golden Tiger script—*
*All spirits heed, none dare disobey.*
*Should any defy my great Dao,*
*You shall be demoted, your Way unfulfilled.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the* Northern Chief Purple Tenuity Lady’s *Song and Statutes command.*

*Golden radiance revolves the seven circuits,*
*The flying divine tiger opens the nether pass.*
*Revolving the celestial constant, treading the mysterious firmament,*
*Returning purity to support the infant and stabilize the virtuous orchid.*
*Profound and distant, sustaining fullness to reflect the imperial court,*
*Ascending brilliance, coiling around the destined web.*
*Harmonizing the seven luminaries into one household,*
*Separation and union naturally bear jade blossoms.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the* Central Dipper Great Sage *decrees.*

Visualize the *Divine Tiger* officials and generals riding the purple cloud-*qi* with the incense smoke, entering the seal. After the offering, store it in a crimson pouch. Turn to face north and recite:

**Oṃ kuśa luśi krodha lu [ ] śvaḥ!**

Form the *Left Dipper Seal* at the heart, the *Sword Mudra* at the waist. Visualize the body as the *Azure Mystery Jade Form*, strike the teeth three times, and loudly summon:

*Northern Chief Mysterious Range Prefecture,*
*Burn incense to summon the* Day Duty Merit Clerk—*hasten here!*

Recite the secret incantation, visualize their arrival, and proceed as usual. Once the *Merit Clerk* arrives, present this precious incense to summon the designated general. Then proceed with the invocation.

*Golden Gate’s luminous splendor,*

*Transforms and responds naturally.*

*[ ] the primal, gather the po,*

*Hasten and gallop swiftly,*
*Swiftly, as the* Inner Perfected Lady *decrees.*

*Yin Trigram, Northern Qi.*

**First Summons:**
*Mysterious Heaven Jade Tablet,*

*Harmonizes with the talisman.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the* Divine Tiger Great Sage *decrees.*

These three incantations are used for all talismanic burnings, general summons, prayers, issuances of jade tablets, and talismanic decrees.

**Method of Whistling Mandate**

The method states: The Three Departments’ messengers reside in the *Abyssal Source Palace*, the chief prefecture of the Three Yin, governing the summoning of Yin-*qi*. The *Divine Tiger* dwells at the head of the Three Burners; the Seven Jade Maidens occupy the seven orifices; the *Yang Radiance* and *Yin Spirit* reside beneath the left and right eyes; the Two Sages dwell beneath the nostrils; the *Lucid Hun-Seeking Divine General* resides in the two kidneys; the *Divine Tiger* messengers and others all abide within the *Flowery Pond*. Through the seven revolutions of the numinous root, breath divides the *qi*, dispersing, ascending, and transforming to emerge before the altar.

With the divine officials and tiger messengers of the Dharma Department, merge into a single form, directing them at will—simply guide and summon them by riding the *qi*. Now, the *Whistling Mandate* emits the *qi* of heart and lungs, coalescing into Yin-wind and mysterious mist, flying forth to call the *Divine Tiger*. Thus, the heart perceives and form responds; all divine officials chant and whistle as they arrive.

**Issuing the Jade Tablet Rite**
Summon the generals as before, entering the ritual with three offerings. The text follows the *Purification Rites: Invocation and Prayer* section.

After the three libations, pray thus:
*"All who receive talismans and register records obey the statutes of the Most High. To gather souls and summon spirits, we follow the decrees of the Mysterious Master. May swift steeds and flying chariots hasten the journey of cultivation."*

Hold the *Great Unity Mysterious Prime Jade Tablet* and solemnly proclaim it.

**Proclaim the Jade Tablet**, then the *Pass Edict*,
and recite again the preceding incantations over the Jade Tablet.

**Incantation for Dispatching the Jade Tablet**
*"Great Unity Purple Prime Lord, Heavenly Unity Northern Mandate commands.
Divine Tiger’s halberd flies, the Dipper’s sway unites all.
Where the Jade Tablet reaches, where the Divine Tiger arrives,
the radiance of the ten directions is inhaled in one breath.
Hasten, hasten, as the law decrees!"*

Recite this seven times, then inhale the essence-*qi* of the ten directions and blow it forth.

*"Primal Beginning’s talismanic mandate summons the Mysterious Darkness.
Jade Maidens, Great Sages, Yin-spirits descend in power.
The Three *Hun* hasten here, the Seven *Po* do not tarry.
Yin-*qi* steals forth in silence, Yang-*qi* speeds its course.
The Three Offices and Northern Fengdu inspect the ghostly camps.
Transcend the Three Realms, roam freely in the Highest Clarity.
Hasten, hasten, as the Primal Lord of Heaven commands!"*

For the central text, with Northern *qi* and holding the Jade Tablet to dispatch the generals, proclaim loudly:

*"Hear now, Divine Tiger Great Sage, Jade Maidens of the Seven Bureaus, Messengers of the Three Departments, and Spirit Officials of the Soul-Gathering Ministry—attend to my words!
By imperial appointment, I hold the seal and insignia, embodying the Most High to aid transformation and deliver humanity, commanding the Divine Tiger to pursue souls and gather spirits.
Today, I follow the secret canon of the Golden Casket and issue the hidden writ of the Jade Tablet. My orders must be executed without delay.
Your numinous transformations are swift—hence, I rely on your aid to transmit them.
May you swiftly harness your chariots to float through the void, traversing heaven and earth, upholding the commands of the Supreme Mystery, and reaching every divine realm in the boundless expanse.
Verify names and pursue wandering souls, regardless of distance or depth, without obstruction or detention.
Let not a moment pass before they arrive in hesitation, manifesting clearly to awaken the deluded.
Guide them all to the purification altar, that they may personally receive the sagely grace.
I humbly await your luminous response—do not delay.
The Mysterious Edict is resplendent; the fiery decree is swift!"*

Step to the right into the Dipper’s mouth, facing southeast. Recite the incantation of the Supreme Unity’s Purple Prime Lady seven times, draw in the qi of the southeast, take it into the water, wield the sword, sip the water, and spray it forth.

Erect the yin and yang altars and perform the summoning ritual for the generals as before. Visualize the invocation of the sages, then proclaim in a loud voice:

The generals have arrived—hear my earnest prayer.
I, though unworthy, hold office in this great teaching, undeserving of my station.
The immortal ranks are entrusted with the authority of refining at Southern Prosperity, while the Northern Chief oversees the bureau of pursuit and capture.
The duties I bear must first be made clear in this proclamation.
Yesterday, so-and-so submitted a petition, and now, as the fast approaches its appointed time, the Mysterious Net is about to be raised.
I have repeatedly presented my memorials, seeking to bring prosperity to the hidden and submerged.
Thus, I establish the yang-altar to illuminate the yin spirits and summon the hosts of male souls and female souls.
Now, in accordance with the Mysterious Regulations, I recite the admonitions and invite the divine chariots to descend.

Relying solely on divine might, I command the pursuit and capture.
May you faithfully carry out the entrusted charge and greatly revive the ancestral teachings.
Pause briefly in your radiant presence to partake of this humble offering.

Next, perform the three-fold presentation as prescribed in the *Rituals of Fasting and Invocation*. Recite the scriptures and proclaim the petitions.

Then, with the left hand form the Six Sovereigns Mudra and with the right the Jade Purity Mudra. Using the middle finger, trace upon the earth according to the altar’s design.

**Tracing the Yang-Illuminating Altar, recite the Yang Dipper Chapter:**
The Five Phases create—then return to the Five Phases.
Three fingers descend—four great elements provisionally unite, yet revert to the Great Void.
Be it yin or yang, they follow the root and origin of heaven and earth.
When the four centers of heaven and earth darken, myriad ghosts lie hidden.
When the four above heaven and earth stir, myriad ghosts are scattered.
At the center, yin and yang revolve—spirits and ghosts prosper.
With the two below, summon these wandering souls to my altar.
With the two within, bestow upon them the sacred writ to return to the Supreme Clarity.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the decree of the Supreme Unity’s Dark and Mysterious Law commands.

At noon, exit the center. Upon completing the tracing, draw the qi of the Ghost Gate and blow it forth nine times, then flick the mudra.

**Tracing the Yin-Spirit Altar, recite the Yin Dipper Chapter:**
Yin and yang shift and turn—kalpas change and pass.
Within the Five Fingers, life and death cycle—who is wise, who is foolish?
Departing and returning, endless—such is the creation of the Supreme Mystery.
Those who have not escaped the Three Realms are bound by divine transformation.
At *yin*, the Eastern Dipper turns; at *you*, the Western Dipper revolves.
At *mao*, face south; at *zi*, proceed north.
At *wu*, yin spirits are vast and obscure; at *zi*, yang souls drift aimlessly.
When heaven and earth darken, myriad ghosts lie hidden.
Follow to *yin*—when heaven and earth stir, myriad ghosts are scattered.
Follow to *si*—yin and yang revolve, spirits and ghosts prosper.
Follow to the center—the Supreme Unity summons—why delay?
From *chen*, whether first or last, the law is constant.
Follow to *hai*—the Celestial One of the North blesses the Divine Tiger’s decree.
At *mao*, the Supreme Unity’s Purple Mystery manifests souls and spirits.
Summoned by this, the wandering hasten to my altar.
The Earth bestows upon you the sacred writ to return to the Supreme Clarity.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the Divine Tiger Lady of the Supreme Unity’s Dark and Mysterious Law commands, lead them upward and depart.

Upon completion, draw the qi of the Ghost Gate and blow it forth nine times, then flick the mudra. Next, wield the sword and face the two altars, reciting the incantation:

Yang illuminates and returns the soul—defying the scriptures of death.
Yin essence captures the spirit—restoring the corpse to transcend calamity.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the law commands.

**Incantation for Capturing Soul and Spirit to Proceed Together to the Altar and Manifest Traces:**
The light of the womb remains undimmed; the luminous spirit encamps the soul.
The hidden essence revives; the corpse-dog departs with treachery.
The crouching corpse is purged of evil; the sparrow’s yin is without blemish.
Swallowing the thief opens clarity; the venomous masses are unobstructed.
Purify filth without interference; close the foul lungs.
The yang soul returns to its origin—heaven and earth’s true qi gathers your form.
This is the Five Phases’ creation and true essence.
The myriad spirits of the five viscera forever preserve peace.
Yang soul and yin spirit, enter the form without exception.
With each breath, hasten to transform into truth.
At the first stroke of the sacred talisman, the altar manifests the soul’s presence.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the Divine Tiger Law of the Supreme Unity’s Dark and Mysterious commands.

**General Incantation for Summoning the Sinful Souls of Hell:**
The Three Treasures Lords of the Yellow and Old,
The purple clouds’ qi of the Upper Heaven—
Capture and restrain the souls of the Nine Dark Realms,
Boundless is the Great Mystery.
All become natural beings; hell holds no confinement.
Open the Gate of Radiant Light—awaken to the true Dao and unite.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the law commands.

**The Divine Tiger’s Seven Perfected Inner Scripture:**
The Jade Perfected’s Myriad Flowers Palace,
Where the High Immortals conceal the Emperor’s scriptures.
It governs the chart of the Nine Heavens’ surface,
Penetrating the observation of the Primal Honored One within.
Seven revolutions summon the myriad spirits;
The Five Peaks vow to come and welcome.
The Azure Dragon guards to the left;
The Vermilion Bird seizes the Dark and Obscure.
The Three Palaces summon the Demon Kings;
The Registrar examines their presentations.
The White Tiger assists to the left;
The Dark Warrior unravels entanglements.
Deliver from the depths of the Yellow Springs;
Record in the immortal books of the Supreme Clarity.
Release all enmities and dissolve grievances;
No ancient grudges remain unresolved.
Seven generations’ karmic knots are untied;
Lost essence and blood are restored.
Return to the Crimson Fire Chamber of the womb,
Reborn within the Grotto’s midst.
A hundred scribes guard the divine precincts,
Commanding the omens to preserve the Yellow Tranquility.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the law commands.

This scripture, when recited in audience and devotion, dissolves completed karmic bonds, separates the departed, and guides men and women to rebirth.
Recite it seven times, alternately tracing the yin and yang Dippers.

**Ritual for Summoning Souls to the Altar:**
After tracing the altar as before, burn the Divine Tiger talismans—or employ other methods as needed—all to be applied here.
Command the officials and generals to swiftly capture and assemble the departed souls and hidden spirits, summoning them to the altar to manifest their traces.

**Summoning Incantation:**
The yang spirit returns with the wind’s birth;
The yin soul follows my banner.
Soul and spirit, heed the talisman’s call—
Hasten swiftly to the altar of the numinous banner!
The yang spirit returns to your remnant;
The yin soul comes to my banner.
The Northern Dipper’s Heavenly Vanguard decrees;
The Dark Warrior opens the gates of the hidden.
Let the three souls not scatter;
Let the seven spirits not waste away.
By the power of this golden talisman,
Capture you and bring you to the altar of the numinous banner!
May you receive the supreme Dao
And ascend to the ranks of immortals.

**Yang Hymn:**
The Five Phases create—then return to the Five Phases.
(See the tracing of the Yang-Illuminating Altar.)

**Secret Incantation:**
The Three Officials of the Northern Feng,
Inspecting the ghostly encampments—
No concealment is permitted.
The Golden Horse’s courier route proclaims boundlessly;
The myriad spirits all listen.
The Three Realms and Five Emperors,
Declare to the Supreme Clarity.

**Swiftly, swiftly—by the divine tiger’s law and command!**

**Yin Hymn:**
Yin and Yang revolve their courses;
The kalpas shift and change.
(See the tracing of the Yin-Spirit Altar.)

**Secret Incantation:**
By the Primordial One’s talismanic decree,
The hours and moments ascend and transform.
Let the dead souls receive refinement,
Transmuted into immortals, made human again.
No concealment is permitted—
The Golden Horse’s courier route proclaims boundlessly.
Surpass the Three Realms,
And roam freely in the Supreme Clarity.
**Swiftly, swiftly—by the divine tiger’s law and command!**

**General Invocation:**
Having ascended to the profound mysteries of the Supreme Dao,
We establish the Divine Tiger’s Numinous Bureau.
Having dispersed the writ among the divine perfected,
And issued the jade decrees for all to follow,
We humbly beseech the Great Sage Envoys,
The Jade Maidens, the officials and soldiers,
The divine troops of the Dharma departments,
And all the officers and generals of the various bureaus—
To proceed directly to the realms of the living and the courts of the dead,
To traverse freely the yin domains and yang palaces,
To thoroughly inspect the offices of measurement, restraint, and registration,
And to extend the governance of water, fire, wind, and blade.
Search out the roots and trace the bonds of the departed souls,
Pursue and gather the hidden spirits destined for reunion.
In the space between a breath and a blink,
Let them all manifest within the two altars.
We further command the Wardens of the Prisons,
The Gatherer-Souls Merit Officers,
To assemble and marshal them in good order,
Lest they clamor or fall into disorder.
If they bear grievances or debts,
Let these be resolved according to the matter at hand.
May they turn their thoughts and change their hearts,
Avoiding future entanglements in karmic opposition.
Thus may they approach the altar to receive deliverance,
Attain fruition, and ascend in rank—
Truly relying on the merit of your aid,
And together propagating the teachings of the Mysterious Origin.
Receive our earnest invocation,
And act in strict compliance.
Let no delay or disobedience
Hinder the work of liberation.
When the task is accomplished,
You shall be rewarded and honored as the law prescribes.
**Hasten, hasten!**

**Threefold Summons of the Departed Souls:**
According to the ritual, set up the banner and all talismanic decrees,
Seal the doors of the Divine Tiger’s Hall,
And each day burn and recite the talismans and proclamations,
Urging the pursuit of the souls until all have arrived at the altar and manifested.
Further instruct them to appear in dreams or through signs,
Making the auspicious response clear.
On the day the altar is opened, unseal the doors,
And within the hall, perform the summons anew,
Following the previous ritual sequence.

**The Primordial Jade Decree**
The Master says: The *Primordial Jade Decree* is the sacred covenant of the Jade Clarity’s Divine Tiger,
The esoteric mandate of the Three Sovereigns for summoning spirits,
A writ personally bestowed by the Primordial One,
Containing the Dao of reviving the dead and delivering humanity.
After the transmission of the *Flying Mystery* by the Lord of the Three Heavens’ Great Mystery Capital,
The divine text was left in the Bi-Lu Grotto of Mount Longhu.
During the Tang dynasty, the Heavenly Master Ye Jingneng
Was instructed by the Primordial Lady of the Great One, who said:
*“In the northern vault of the Mysterious Range at Longhu,
Seek the Western Bi-Lu.
By obtaining it, you shall summon souls and spirits to ascend to the High Clarity,
And your divine merit may serve as the teacher of emperors.”*
Later, Ye Jingneng followed the inscription and found it.
Moreover, the Perfected Lord Liu Gen,
The immortal Sun Deng,
And the Heavenly Master Liu Gang
All encountered it.
For those who practice this art:
Without the Jade Decree, the souls of the departed cannot be gathered,
And their deliverance will be difficult to accomplish.
This is like accepting wealth from a net of sins,
And sowing calamity in a field of blessings.
When submitting a petition to the courts of the underworld,
Use white silk three feet six inches long,
Or seven feet high by one foot two inches wide.
Back it with white paper,
Write the Jade Decree and proclamation in cinnabar on the front,
And the petition in ink on the reverse.
Also inscribe in ink the proper name of the deceased,
Their cause of death,
And their dates of birth and passing,
Aligning them beneath the star talisman corresponding to their life destiny.
For mass deliverances with many names,
Add the character “et al.” beneath the primary name,
While the rest are recorded in the ledger,
Attached to the front of the decree.
Seal it with the *Jade Chief Controller of the Great Emperor of the Vast Return of Brightness*.
Use blue paper for the inner and outer envelopes,
Inscribing them in cinnabar.
It is also said:
Seal it with the *General Inspector of Ghosts and Spirits* seal,
And adorn it with painted images of the Three Envoys.
Send it forth with the official dispatch,
Burning it amidst the blue smoke.
For rituals other than the universal deliverance of the Mysterious Altar,
Do not use it recklessly.
Otherwise, the Earth Bureau will immediately report to the Three Officials,
Swiftly petitioning the Supreme Mystery,
And you will be stripped of rank and penalized in merit—
This may be expected at once.

**Method:**
When inscribing, face east and set up the altar for the Lady of the Dark Mystery.
With the left hand, form the Divine Tiger mudra:
Press down the second and third fingers with the thumb,
Then grasp the second joint of the little finger with the thumb.
Knock the teeth nine times,
Summon the generals as before,
Draw the qi from the northwest into the brush,
And write.

**Yang-Day Jade Decree (Scattered Form):**
*By order of the Northern Chief Lord, I urgently summon the Six Jia Spirits.
The Mighty Left Pursuer of Souls, Commander of the Hundred Nodes,
Holding the Jade Decree, governs the karmic nature of the netherworld.
True essence descends with a single qi—good and evil are all made clear.
The Star Prime serves as the ghostly law—all spirits listen in reverence.
Regardless of guilt or innocence, kinship or estrangement,
The Black Law Lady captures souls and returns them to infancy.
Capture the souls and bring them to the altar—
Lord Bo, swiftly enact the numinous!
What [gap] receives the command—act with utmost urgency!
Swiftly capture!*
*Transform the Primordial, report to the flying stars—
One character, one stroke.*

**Yang-Day Seven Stars’ Corresponding Talismans:**
1. First: Born in *zi*
2. Second: Born in *chou* or *hai*
3. Third: Born in *yin* or *xu*
4. Fourth: Born in *mao* or *you*
5. Fifth: Born in *chen* or *shen*
6. Sixth: Born in *si* or *wei*

For the above seven talismans, inscribe the one corresponding to the life destiny of the primary deceased beneath their star.
Then write in ink their dates of birth, death, month, day, and hour,
Or their burial or cremation details, in two columns.

**Yin-Day Jade Decree (Scattered Form):**
*By the karmic authority of the Mysterious Lady, I summon the Six Ding Spirits.
The Martial Right Phoenix Officer, the Reversed Life Controller of the Dark Bureau,
Obeying the Jade Decree, governs the karmic nature of the yin barrier.
The Heavenly One of the Northern Blessing—qi divides the paths of life and death clearly.
How dare the Three Realms defy? The Ten Directions all welcome.
Even eons of enmity and vengeance—upon the talisman’s arrival, all cease.
Listen, all spirits of myriad deaths—return to your roots!
Capture the souls and bring them to the altar—
The chief officer swiftly responds to the numinous!
[Gap] receive the altar’s command—act with utmost urgency!
Swiftly capture!*
*Support the infant, stabilize the destiny—
One character, one stroke.*

4. Fourth: Born in *mao* or *you*

**Jade Edict Summons**

*Supreme Primordial Jade Edict—Urgent Pursuit and Summons of the Deceased’s Contract*

Within the Three Realms and Nine Provinces, summon the departed spirit—
[Name] of the present offering, hasten, hasten!
By imperial decree, execute without delay.
Let no negligence occur.
Divine Tiger Officers—urgently bear the talisman and proclaim below to the presiding authorities.

**Full Form of the Jade Edict**
*Northern Dipper, Great Unity, Dark Mystery, Divine Tiger, Primordial Jade Edict.*

Inscribe the Jade Edict in seal script:
*"Heavenly Unity, Northern Blessing, Great Unity of Purple Origin, Northern Chief, Dark Model, Primordial Jade Edict—*
Proclaim below to the Three Realms and Ten Directions:
Heavenly Courts, Earthly Prisons, Mountains and Seas, Springs and Nether Passes,
Northern Capital of Luo Deng, Six Caves and Ten Palaces, Three Origins and Nine Bureaus,
One Hundred Twenty Offices, the Lands of Yu Jue, the Boundaries of Dark Yin,
All Great Hells, the Nine Provinces’ domains,
City Gods and Earth Deities, Village Boundaries and Wastelands,
Yellow Springs and Mugwort Hamlets, all who govern souls and spirits—
Wherever [the deceased] may pertain or belong—
Pursue and seize the aforementioned departed, [Name] et al.,
Depart swiftly from your jurisdiction, hasten to the Mysterious Altar,
Pay homage to the Supreme Emperor, and receive extraordinary grace."

Divine Tigers, execute the command—
All spirits, heed with reverence.
As the proclamation decrees, transmit by wind and fire courier.

Proclaimed on the [Day] of the [Month], [Year] of the Great Year, at [Hour].

**Dharma Position:** Your servant [Name], bearing the Jade Edict, executes the command—
*Northern Dipper, Great Unity, Dark Mystery, Divine Tiger, Inner Perfected Lady.*

*The Primordial Jade Edict of the Most High, Iron Charter for Summoning Souls.*

The Master instructs:
"For those who wish to universally deliver the violently deceased, the Iron Charter for Summoning Souls must be employed to gather them.
Within the Charter, *Fuying Zhaopan Landingshu* is the yin-name of the Seven Original True Lords; *Huayuan Yubai Xingfeize* is the inner taboo of the Lady of the Dipper.
Thus, the essence of the Northern Dipper revolves yin and yang, assembling their hun and po to restore the semblance of form and shadow—only then may they be gathered.
For the violently deceased, yin-qi entangles in confusion, the heart-spirit inverts in error, and the true origin is lost in delusion.
After sudden death, the yang-hun dissipates entirely, yin-qi obstructs the barrier, light remains unseen, the hun departs, and the po scatters.
Therefore, the Most High, in boundless compassion, established this Charter to gather them—this is called the *Numinous Treasure’s Limitless Deliverance of Humanity.*"

**Method of Use:**
Inscribe with realgar and cinnabar, writing the deceased’s name, dates of birth and death, and place of burial or cremation beneath their corresponding star.
For mass deliverance with many names, record them beneath the Jade Edict, omitting dates if unknown—but details must still be meticulously declared.
This is dispatched alongside the *Faith-Offering Silk, the Talisman, and the True Forms of the Three Envoys of the Jade Edict*, all to be burned together.

*Fuying Zhaopan Landingshu* (half-circle to *wu*, reverse wheel)
*Huayuan Yubai Xingfeize* (*wu* to *zi*, reverse wheel)

**Supreme Primordial Jade Edict of Urgent Summons**

Within the measured convergence of all talismanic writs—charters, chapters, and seals—are the suffering souls of the hidden realms, those of the living’s edge and the dead’s domain, universally and wholly subject to the Emperor’s decree. The Divine Tiger Officers and Generals shall seize and deliver them as commanded; no negligence or indulgence shall be tolerated.

We hereby issue the *Primordial Unity Jade Edict of Summoning Souls*, entrusting it to the Envoys of Soul-Summoning, who shall proceed to the Nether Courts to retrieve the souls of the deceased, [Name(s) of the departed listed below], and escort them to the altar for deliverance.

All governing spirits shall open the gates and clear the paths, executing this command with utmost haste. Let none delay or obstruct, as this is the sovereign mandate.

Issued on the [Day] of the [Month] in the [Year] of the Tai Sui, at the [Hour].

**Soul-seizing, Spirit-capturing—**
*Thus is the office of life and death, departure and stay, entrusted to you.*

The governing spirits of the Nether Bureau shall act in accordance with this decree.

If the departed soul fails to appear when summoned by talisman, it is often due to the weight of their karmic offenses and the severity of their sins, resulting in their imprisonment by the nether courts. The master must then ascend in spirit to petition the Celestial Emperor, presenting memorials and supplications to implore special mercy. Only then may the talismanic edict be employed to summon them. Internally, the master must recite the Cavernous Scriptures and perform the *Way of Total Dissolution of Heavy Yin*, causing the prisons of Fengdu to shatter, the boiling cauldrons to cease, and the freezing halls to suspend their torments. Thus, the suffering souls may be liberated and receive the merit of the fast. The *Way of the Divine Tiger* is thereby fulfilled.

**Compiled for the Ritual Fasts, Talismanic Scripts, and Methods of Practice**

**The Master Instructs:**
For all talismanic scripture and matching talismanic commands, one must enter the oratory in accordance with the method, engage in visualization, and arrange within the chamber the Three Realms’ Imperial Masters, the Heavenly Perfected Sovereigns, the Yellow Register True Governors, and the talismanic green-script’s numinous officials. Prepare incense, flowers, a ritual table, brushes, inkstones, cinnabar, and ink—all requisites must be complete. First perform the inner refinement method.

---

**The Cavernous Yang Inner Refinement: Flying Spirit of the Eight Effulgences**
**Method:**
At the hour of the six yang, enter the chamber, sit upright, knock the teeth three times, hold the breath, and settle into stillness. Visualize the fire in the lower cinnabar field as the size of a pellet. Revolve it nine times to the left, ascending to the Crimson Palace, then gradually rise through the Twelve-Storied Tower to sit centered in the Mud-Pill Palace. Hold the sun in the left hand and the moon in the right, and intone the title: *Great Cavern Supreme Unity August Emperor*.

**Incantation:**
*May the spirit-soul be serene and upright,*
*May the myriad qi eternally abide.*
*Unmarred by vexations,*
*The body radiates light.*
*Guarded by the Three Realms,*
*Welcomed by the Five Emperors.*
*Myriad spirits pay homage,*
*My name inscribed in Supreme Clarity.*
*When merit is complete,*
*Ascend to Supreme Clarity in flight.*

Recite the incantation three times, then draw in the fire and swallow it three times.

**Further Incantation:**
*Refine the form with golden liquor,*
*Unite with the Dao in truth.*
*Illumine the Three Effulgences,*
*This is called the Heavenly Root.*
*No darkness, no limit,*
*No beginning, no end.*
*The Primal August Nine Shameful Ones,*
*The spirit-soul in the Crimson Palace.*
*Purple clouds take flight to heaven,*
*The body rides the six dragons.*
*Water above, fire below,*
*Flowing into the Three Palaces.*
*The spirit returns to Yang Brightness,*
*The Great Dao naturally opens.*

Recite the incantation three times, swallow saliva three times, and after a long while, a circular image will appear at the nape, its light illuminating the ten directions.

The *Supreme Mystery Primordial Most High Dao Lord* shall manifest the three qi’s true spirits from within the adept’s body: the Lords of Life, Records, Merit, and Execution, along with the Lords Taokang and Jingyan.

The adept now refines the true primordial, its light illuminating the Nine Heavens, sweeping away the yang essence, and penetrating the Nine Gates. This enables the dead souls to undergo refinement, return to the womb, and be reborn. For self-refinement, modify the phrase to: *Form and spirit both wondrous, uniting with the Dao in truth.* Draw in the fire qi and swallow it nine times.

For all talismanic writing, perform this method repeatedly over time, and the spirit-light will naturally appear.

---

**Talismanic Writing Formula**
**Method:**
For all talismanic writing, set up an incense table, face the Heavenly Gate, and arrange the requisite ritual implements before you. Visualize the cinnabar inkstone and water vessel as the sun and moon, the paper as a golden tablet, the brush as the Azure Dragon, the incense smoke as white clouds, and the talismanic scribe above them. The talismanic method’s Central Palace General and the Divine Maiden are arrayed to the left and right.

Once done, form the Dipper Mudra with the hands, visualize the Five Dippers coiling around the body, and pace the *Huoluo Dipper*. Insert the *Emperor’s Finger Seal*, visualize the body entering the Northern Dipper of the Three Terraces, and with both hands, trace the Dipper. Hold the ritual tablet upright, bow three times, and offer incense. Knock the teeth, kneel, and memorialize:

*Your subordinate, [Name], humbly burns incense and memorializes the Most High Boundless Great Dao, the Golden Watchtower’s Seven Treasures Most Honored, the Eastern Ultimate Compassionate Father, the Sound-Responding and Response-Attending Supreme Unity Salvation-from-Suffering Heavenly Worthy, the Ten Directions’ Salvation-from-Suffering Heavenly Worthies, the Nine Dark Realms’ Deliverance-from-Sin Heavenly Worthy, the Nine Heavens’ Life-Engendering Emperor, the Thirty-Two Heavens’ Imperial Lords, the Five Directions’ Five Elders’ Imperial Lords, the Sun Palace and Moon Mansion’s Two Luminaries’ Imperial Lords, the Southern Dipper’s Six Offices’ Star Lords of Pottery-Spirits, the Northern Dipper’s Seven Primes’ Star Lords of Casting-Souls, the Three Primes’ Three Grades’ Three Officials’ Great Emperors, the Numinous Treasure Initiation’s Five Masters’ Perfected Lords, the Heavenly Perfected Star Persons, the Wondrous Conduct Perfected Persons, the Southern Prosperity’s Upper and Lower Palace Masters of Refining the True Governors, and the Three Registers’ Court’s subordinate officials and all true governors within the received scriptures of the ritual methods.*

*I humbly beseech the Dao’s compassion to deign to peer down and discern. Your subordinate is a lowly ant, a humble blade of grass. By former good affinity, I have presumptuously practiced the Great Teaching. Deeply hoping to succor beings, I aspire to establish minor merit. Having received the petition, how could I dare to suppress or reject it? Your subordinate now memorializes on behalf of the fast’s sponsor, [Name], who has submitted a petition with sincere intent. Today, I reverently prepare the oratory, respectfully follow the Numinous Treasure fast’s methods, and write talismans, registers, and proclamations to await the appointed time, applying them according to the prescribed format. I reflect that your subordinate is foolish, ignorant, and defiled, having failed to reach the Mystery Primordial. I implore Heaven’s grace to deign to bestow compassion and pity.*

May the Great Dao bestow the wondrous radiance of the Ten Directions’ Orthodox Black, flowing into my body’s pores and heart’s orifices, into the vermilion and ink implements, so that knots may be untied, the womb-root purified, and through concentrated mindfulness, resonance achieved—true light emitted. With each stroke and each pore, may I unite with the Dao and the True. In all undertakings, may auspicious responses manifest, perfectly aligning with the mysteries of the Supreme Mystery and fulfilling the complete merit of salvation.

I, presumptuously daring the might of Heaven, await your command with utmost reverence and urgency.

Upon concluding the invocation, I visualize the Most High enthroned within the Heavenly Treasure Terrace, the true ranks arrayed in solemn order, as the Emperor commands the attending perfected to descend, bearing talismans and registers.

Then I behold the Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions, emitting great luminosity, descending through the void. Youths and maidens, bearing jeweled caskets within a radiance of a hundred treasures, approach the altar before me. The casket is opened, revealing a matching talisman, which merges with the one I have inscribed—its brilliance dazzling the eyes. My form transforms into the Left and Right Perfected of the Azure Mystery, attended by maidens.

Facing east within the oratory, I click my teeth thirty-two times, ascending through the thirty-two heavens, and bow in my heart thirty-two times. Closing my eyes in tranquil contemplation, I envision myself seated upon a cloud of azure, yellow, and white, the inner and outer enveloped in mist. Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Dark Warrior array themselves in the four quarters, while sun and moon illumine the chamber. Above my head arises a nine-colored orb, its light suffusing the ten directions.

Next, I invoke:
*"Most High Primordial, Supreme Dao Lord, summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Left and Right Attending Envoys, the Jade Lads of Incense, the Jade Maidens of Transmission, the Five Thearchs’ Direct Talismans, the Direct Officers of the Day, and the Fragrant Palace Attendants—thirty-two each—to convey my words. On this auspicious day, I reverently establish a grand fast for [Name], to deliver [Name]. Inscribing talismans and registers, I rescue and deliver the souls of the departed. May my supplication ascend directly to the august presence of the Most High, the Primordial Celestial Venerable of the Thirty-Two Heavens."*

Then I draw qi thirty-two times and take my seat to inscribe the talisman.

The Nine Heavens have a mandate, announced above to Jade Clarity. Hasten the summoning of a thousand Perfected; all assemble in the Emperor’s court. The Supreme One gazes below; the Twin Emperors display their forms. They oversee the myriad evils, govern *qi*, and seize life. If there is any inauspiciousness, they test the divine luminaries. The Way of the Azure Emperor marshals the divine soldiers. The Seven Spirits hold the reins; the Heavenly Peng marches to the right. The divine sword leads the way; flames and fire bells flash forth. The command is issued to armored troops; the celestial soldiers and Heavenly Ding engage. Wind and fire join battle, vanquishing evil and strangling spirits. Above, they awe the Six Heavens; below, they seize the myriad spirits. Having awed and seized, the myriad malevolences are destroyed. The divine halberd sweeps like lightning; no life remains for demons and traitors. The Immortal Emperor holds the staff—who dares delay the command? Those who resist the staff and defy the order will have their forms destroyed. Each be vigilant, each be cautious, and preserve your yellow tranquility. The Nine Heavens’ edict commands; the myriad spirits respectfully listen. Respectfully summon such-and-such spirit to heed my instructions. Whoever dares defy my command defies Upper Clarity. Swiftly, swiftly, as the Primordial Beginning’s command and the myriad spirits’ law seize.

**Fasting Rites and Talisman Scripts Section**
**Four Courier Memorials**

The Master said: For every establishment of a Mystic Altar, one must set up the Four Courier Courts, dedicated solely to receiving and transmitting talismanic dispatches—this mirrors the post stations of the mortal realm.

The Four Couriers are: the Flood Dragon Courier, the Golden Dragon Courier, the Wind-Fire Courier, and the Golden Horse Courier. Each courier is governed by divine officers, appearing as mighty warriors bearing yellow command banners, awaiting deployment. They must be summoned through talismans inscribed according to the prescribed form before they may descend in response.

For the two dragon couriers, fresh and pure *jia* stalks should be bound to represent their true forms. Each courier officer wields a sword in the left hand and holds a banner in the right, upon which is inscribed *"Jade Emperor, Heavenly Worthy of Pardoning Sins."* On their backs, they bear the *"True Talisman of Azure Mystery, Savior from Suffering,"* shaped like a scroll tube. The bodies of the dragon couriers and the forms of the dragon-mouthed spirit scribes must be prepared with talismans according to the prescribed method, accompanied by invocations and praises.

The Flood Dragon Officer pertains to *yin*; when dispatched, it should be paired with the Earthly Office’s Merit Clerk to journey to the Five Peaks, Nine Netherworlds, Water Palaces, Thunder Bureaus, Plague Controllers, City Gods, Earth Deities, and prison cells—wherever souls in bondage may be rescued. The Golden Dragon Officer pertains to *yang*; when dispatched, it should be paired with the Yellow Register Institute’s Merit Clerk and talisman officers to journey to the Three Officials’ Heavenly Prisons, the Five Ladles’ Heavenly One Northern Dungeon, the iron-walled enclosures of Luo and Zheng, and all manner of hellish confines—wherever souls may be delivered. This is because *yin* and *yang* must each follow their kind.

Each of the Four Couriers has its own jurisdiction. The talismans for summoning the *jia* Dragon and Golden Dragon Officers have already been provided following the *"Longevity and Salvation from Suffering"* talisman. The rest are detailed below for your careful use.

**Wind-Fire Courier**

The Master said: The Wind-Fire Courier comprises one bureau, called the Fire Bureau. A Judgment Officer presides over it, overseeing both the Left Wind Courier and the Right Fire Courier. The Left is solely responsible for transmitting talismans, decrees, pardons, and documents from the Southern Bureau; the Right is solely responsible for transmitting talismans, edicts, and documents from the Northern Bureau. This Judgment Officer, then, governs the documents of both the Southern and Northern Bureaus. The Wind-Fire Bureau’s Judgment Officer is named Ma Sheng: his face is green, with three eyes; he wears a clustered golden net hat, a vermilion robe, golden armor, green boots, and red hair; he wields a sword and may transform into a being with three heads and nine eyes. Within the two couriers under his command, there are ten Judgment Officers each and three hundred courier clerks. All edicts, talismans, registers, and documents pass through the hands of the presiding officer for inspection and transmission. If any errors or discrepancies are found, they are detained at this courier station and cannot be forwarded; each is assigned to the appropriate prison for punishment. Whenever a fast is established, a formal document must first be submitted to petition for corrections. Then, using this talisman to dispatch a courier clerk will ensure transmission and evoke a manifest response. The talisman method provided hereafter is what people refer to as the Wind-Fire Courier Transmission—this is precisely what it means.

**Talisman for Summoning the Wind-Fire Courier Clerk**
This talisman is written in cinnabar on yellow paper. With the Jade Mudra and *qi* drawn from the northwest, recite the activation incantation to summon one Judgment Officer from the courier station to inspect and verify talismans and decrees. Immediately dispatch one courier clerk from this station; if any errors are found, they will be corrected at once, and the transmission will proceed swiftly.

**Golden Horse Courier**
The Master said: The Golden Horse Courier has a presiding officer who commands one hundred twenty courier clerks. All wear cloud-patterned hats, vermilion robes, and vermilion shoes, and ride flying horses. For all urgent talismans, decrees, and documents that must pass through the Three Officials, Five Masters, Nine Bureaus, Four Offices, the Luo and Zheng Northern Bureaus, the Three Realms, the myriad spirits’ records, and the camps of ghosts—wherever the proclamation is to be universally announced throughout the Three Realms—none may conceal or obstruct it. The edict is issued in an instant, and the divine power and might of the courier ensure that no barriers impede it. Wherever the command arrives, all spirits obey.

**Talisman for Summoning the Golden Horse Courier Clerk**
This talisman is written in cinnabar on yellow paper. With the Jade Mudra and *qi* drawn from the northwest, recite the activation incantation to employ the courier clerks. Burn the talisman at the ritual gate to dispatch one clerk to traverse the Three Realms and the Ten Directions, transmitting decrees and talismans, delivering the suffering souls of the underworld, and achieving the swiftest urgency—arriving in but a moment.

**Chapter on Inviting the Light**

The Master says: To deliver and uplift the yin spirits,
One must obtain the method of Wisdom Light,
Thereby descending the wisdom of the Three Lights,
To connect with the light of mortal fire,
So as to illuminate and shatter the darkness,
And deliver those sunk in the netherworld.
Without this method,
It remains but the light of mortal fire,
Incapable of transcendence.

The method states: On the day of the proper fast at noon,
Face south toward the sun and burn incense.
Inhale qi and blow upon the brush,
Then inscribe twelve Wisdom Light talismans in cinnabar on nine-inch yellow paper.
Use the Jade Purity mudra and Eastern Qi.
Seal with wax to form a torch,
To be used for emitting the light of lamps.

Drifting and wafting, boundless and formless.
*Swiftly, swiftly, by the statutes and decrees.*"*

Hold the incense powder in the *li* trigram of the face, grasp the mirror in the left hand and the talisman in the right, with the torch facing them. Silently recite the incantation, saying:
*"Solar soul, vermilion radiance,
Illuminates the green-shrouded glow.
Returning rosy clouds, crimson spirit,
Mysterious flames raise the image."*

Upon completion, use the solar-flame mirror to capture the sun’s brilliance. Dip the talisman-torch in oil, then touch it to the incense to light a single lamp before the Primordial Origin. For three days and nights, five days and nights, seven days and nights, or up to forty-nine days and nights, the flame must never be extinguished, even briefly. When the candle burns out, light another to continue. If the sky is overcast, use wood-fire instead.

This is called the *Central True Fire*, which can penetrate the Nine Netherworlds below and ascend its light to the Three Luminaries above, universally illuminating the Hall of Blessings.

**Chapter on Awakening Yin and Summoning Yang**
The Master states: The method of the golden bell and jade chime is used to summon and gather the two spirits of yin and yang within oneself, harmonizing heaven and earth, dispelling impurities and defilements, assembling true numina, opening the ten directions, communicating the obscure and the luminous, pursuing and capturing souls, thoroughly collecting and delivering breaths, preventing reckless dissipation. These two spirits govern them.

Thus, at the beginning of altar-opening, one must sound the bell and chime, burn talismans to summon and gather them. The alternating sounds emerge and merge as one, thereby refining yin into yang and upholding pure sincerity. Without stray thoughts or disordered intent, one may then summon the spirits.

Modern people’s veneration of the golden bell and jade chime is not far from this.

The Yang Spirit is named *Lu Hui*, styled *Yan Ling*, eight feet and three inches tall, wearing a *Liang* crown and fiery robes, wielding a sword in his right hand. He presides over yang inquiries at spirit shrines, purifies heaven and earth’s defilements, and drives away the spirits of the hundred trees.

The Yin Spirit is named *Lu Tong*, styled *Yong Fu*, eight feet and three inches tall, wearing a *Liang* crown, white robes with wide sleeves, and wielding a sword while standing amidst qi and clouds. He presides over yin inquiries at the nether bureaus and various prisons, can purify the world’s defilements, and sever the torments of the yin realm.

**Chapter of the Twelve Palace Steps**

The Master said: To establish the Great Purification, one must first erect the Twelve Palace Steps to summon the exalted immortals and perfected spirits and conduct the ritual proceedings. The Twelve Palaces are as follows:

First, the Azure Radiance Hall, where for nine mornings the *Hymn of Salvation from Suffering* is chanted, the *Azure Heavens Void Song Talisman* is burned, and the *Seal of the Demon King* is worn.

Second, the Hall of the Divine Tiger, where each morning the talismans of the *Lord Overseer* and *Lord Scribe* are burned.

Third, the Bureau of Rectification, where for nine mornings impeachments are made and the *Talisman for Descending Perfection and Summoning Spirits* is burned.

Fourth, the Hall of Refined Contemplation, where for nine mornings the *Scripture of the Heavenly Youth* is recited and the *Talisman for Summoning the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings* is burned.

Fifth, the Hall of the Nether Bureaus, where for nine mornings the *Scripture of Salvation from Suffering* is recited and the *Talismans of the Ten Directions’ Salvation-from-Suffering Heavenly Worthies* are burned.

Sixth, the Bureau of Life Oversight, where for nine mornings the *Talisman for the Already-Born and Not-Yet-Born* and the *Talismans of the Ten Heavens’ Mysterious Transformations* are burned, and the *True Writ of Life Oversight* is placed upon the altar.

Seventh, the Office of the Heavenly Physicians for Dispelling Defilements, where the *Talisman for Purifying Heaven and Earth* and the *Talisman for Cleansing Spirits* are burned for nine mornings, along with the *Talisman for Summoning the Heavenly Physicians*.

Eighth, the Bureau of Receiving Refinement, where for nine mornings the *True Register of Lord Han for Delivering Souls* is burned.

Ninth, the Yellow Register Court, where for nine mornings the *Golden Register of the Nine Dark Prisons’ Pardon and Liberation of the Living* is burned.

Tenth, the Case of Receiving Life, where for nine mornings the *Scripture of Attaining the Dao* is recited, and the *Talisman for Returning Corpses and Reviving the Dead* and the *Talismans of the Five Marchmounts for Breaking the Dark and Guiding Souls* are burned.

Eleventh, the General Bureau of the Five Paths, where for nine mornings the *Middle Chapter* is recited and the *True Register of the Great One Jade Emperor’s Entrustment of Life* is burned.

Twelfth, the Bureau of Memorials, where for nine mornings the *Scripture of the Heavenly Youth* is recited and the *Great Opening Talisman* is burned.

Proceed according to this pattern, for these are the bureaus that administer and govern affairs.

**Azure Heavens Void Song Talisman**
This talisman is drawn with both hands in the *chen* position, one stroke covering, one stroke facing upward, from the heart to the hairline. Close the eyes and visualize the body as the Primordial Beginning, bearing a halo, wielding a *ruyi*, the forehead radiating nine-colored light, which then transforms into a five-colored lion throne. Purple clouds cover the body, luminous and penetrating the ten directions. Upon coming to court, intone the *qi*, draw three breaths into the brush, form the *Ding* Mudra of the Supreme Emperor, stand facing east, and inscribe. Strike the teeth nine times, swallow saliva nine times, then visualize the five viscera’s five-colored *qi* entering the talisman. This talisman, placed above the altar, can summon the perfected of the ten directions to descend and dispel defilements. It may also be recited over, burned, practiced, or swallowed.

**Seal of Pacification and Stabilization**
The Master said: In ancient times, when the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Worthy had just divided the primordial chaos and the Three *Qi* unfolded the chart, the one *qi* of the Great Dao’s primordial essence transformed into the *Lingbao* Red Writ. It congealed into script, descended upon the five directions, pacified and stabilized heaven and earth, summoned and commanded true spirits, eliminated heavenly disasters above, protected and stabilized the emperor, warded off poison and harm below, delivered the myriad people, subdued gods and ghosts, and rescued the sunken and drowning—nothing it could not accomplish. Thus, when establishing a purification, one erects a canopy and unfurls the altar, modeling heaven and earth. The nine yang grounds are transformed into golden palaces and jade steps, where a thousand perfected and ten thousand sages assemble in mixed ranks. At that time, when east and west are not yet fixed and the circulation of *qi* is not yet settled, in the space between bowing and raising the head, it is as if turning the palm. One must then scatter the five directions’ jade scripts to summon and stabilize the divine perfected, pacify the five directions, repel and expel demonic vapors, purify the altar space, harmonize square and round, unite movement and stillness, and only then may one invite and receive the imperial perfected, awaiting the mysterious response.

**Method:** When erecting the altar, use the Red Writs of the Five Elders.
First, at dawn, use the *Hundun* Red Writ.
Second, at dawn, use the *Jade Writ for Restraining Demons* or the *Yuandong Jade Calendar Chapter*.
Third, at dawn, use the *Five Lingbao Talismans*.
For setting up the offering, use the *Great Brahma Concealed Language*.
When the affair is concluded, gather the talismans and burn them.
All follows the method of the *Jade Instructions*.

**Section on Ritual Methods and Talismanic Scripts: The Chapter of Illuminating Lamps**

The Master said: Reverently following the method of illuminating lamps from the *Upper Prime Simplified Writs*—

This method was revealed when the Perfected of Liberation besought the Primordial Celestial Worthy. The Celestial Worthy replied: *"The protocols for deliverance and salvation, the gates of transcendence and ascent—all are fully established within the scriptures of the Three Caverns. Now I shall proclaim for you their essential words: among all rites for salvation and deliverance of the deceased, illuminating lamps is supreme."*

The Five Directions and Eight Extremities, the earthly prisons and dark dungeons—these lie in the regions of utmost yin, the realms of eternal night. The souls of the dead are imprisoned and confined, cut off from the Three Luminaries. In their benighted state, they endure countless trials and torments. Therefore, fashion a lamp-tree from catalpa wood, its top branching into nine cups, each holding a lamp. Below, shape pure earth into a Heaven-and-Earth Wheel: the upper part round to symbolize Heaven, the lower square to symbolize Earth. At the upper tier, place the lamp-tree and suspend nine banners, each inscribed with the *Yin Talismans of the Nine Heavens*. With both hands, write the petition text.

At the middle tier, arrange nine lamps in a circular formation and erect nine tablets of the *Nine Qi*. At the lower tier, place nine lamps and erect nine tablets of the *Earth Sovereigns of the Nine Mounds*. Together, the three tiers comprise three nines—twenty-seven lamps. Beyond these, establish eight gates, each with a lamp, and erect the Eight Trigrams, totaling thirty-five lamps. These correspond to the thirty-five divisions of the primordial qi, the *Eight Radiant Scenes of the Upper Mystery*, merging with the qi to enter the Profound Darkness and ascend to illumine the Nine Heavens.

They regulate the upright qi of peace and harmony, stabilizing the movements of the stellar lodges. At the center, they illumine the Nine Wildernesses, sweeping away calamities from the Nine Lands. Below, they shine upon the Nine Netherworlds, the ninefold yin mounds of deepest darkness, piercing the nine paths of obscurity with light, dispelling gloom and illuminating the hidden. The eight outer gates mirror the Eight Extremities. From the day of death through the seven cycles of seven days, the lamp-light remains unbroken. When suffering souls behold this radiance, they are instantly liberated.

**Hell-Breaking Chapter**

The Master said: According to the *True Regulations of the Great One*, when establishing the Nine Prisons above the Earth Gate, construct nine altars of soil and sand, each two feet square, all nine uniform in size. The four sides together span six feet, corresponding to the yin extreme of Earth’s two-six configuration. Each prison is fashioned with four corners and three bends, and within each prison, three lamps are lit, with talismans placed inside the lamps. At the center, a prison tablet is set, upon which talismans are inscribed. Above, nine banners are suspended, each inscribed with talismans according to the prescribed form.

It is further stated: On the front of the banner, inscribe the Heavenly Worthy of the respective direction; on the reverse, the Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions. At the top of the talisman-banner, write the Nine Prisons Talisman; on the two sides, the Hell-Breaking Talisman and the invocation text; at the base, the talisman for the specific prison to which the petition is directed, secured with bamboo stalks.

Another form prescribes nine yellow banners, each inscribed with the *Qi*-Talismans of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Spirits. For each prison broken, one banner is burned. One banner of the Heavens is hung in its place, while at the center, a great banner is erected bearing the sacred title of the Azure Mystery. Let it flutter freely in the wind, and all sins shall be extinguished. This must be performed strictly according to the ritual method; no omission is permissible.

**Memorial from the Humble Official [Name],**
for the establishment of the Grand Yellow Register Retreat to deliver [Name] from suffering.

On this day, the nine-prison divine lamps are lit, and the Jade Clarity Precious Register and the True Talisman for Shattering Earth’s Prisons are proclaimed. By this talismanic decree, at this very hour, let the celestial prisons and earthly hells, the nether gates and shadowed passes, the long night’s Yellow Springs and all underworld authorities heed the command of the Supreme Mystery: open the barriers, unseal the locks, shatter the gates, and release all condemned souls. Let the departed of the Nine Provinces and Ten Directions, regardless of the weight of their transgressions, be freed from their bonds and come forth. Subdue demons, ensure safe passage, and deliver them to the Southern Palace for refinement. Let the dead be tempered, transformed into immortals, and reborn. Let the living receive blessings in the celestial court, enduring through kalpas, turning with the cycles of time, and attaining years equal to heaven. May they forever escape the Three Ways, the Five Sufferings, and the Eight Adversities; transcend the Three Realms; and ascend to the Supreme Clarity, all in accordance with this decree.

Presented in the year, month, day, and hour of the Great Year.
The humble official [Name], bearing the dharma rank, respectfully executes the command.

**Instructions for Shattering Prisons**
Before breaking the prisons, inscribe the Azure Mystery Talisman for Shattering Fengdu on blue paper. On yang days, use cinnabar; on yin days, use ink. Follow the Nine Dragons Talisman, absorbing qi into the talisman. Hold it before your heart when breaking the prisons, burning one talisman per prison. At the Universal Deliverance Prison, employ the Mudra of Numinous Treasure, draw the ancestral qi, silently recite the Transformation Mantra, and burn it with the Returning Light Talisman in the Universal Deliverance Prison.

**Heart Mantra:**
*Chizha li xian guangming.*
Recite three times. Visualize the lamp’s light transforming into a hundred-jeweled auspicious radiance, ascending to the nine heavens and descending to the nine earths. Envision the preceding talisman transforming into countless Heavenly Worthies, pervading all prisons to rescue condemned souls, who emerge from darkness bearing the light.

**Transformation Mantra**
My master, the Heavenly Worthy who rescues suffering within the heavens,
constantly transforms form across the ten directions.
By this mighty and divine great compassion,
deliver all beings from boundless suffering.
In the ninefold night’s dark underworld,
universally illuminate and generate light.
Let the ox-headed jailers all ascend as immortals;
let the myriad suffering souls be liberated.
The prisoners of the Three Ways and Five Sufferings,
freed from all torment, ascend to the Purple Clarity.
All who see, hear, know, or possess sentience,
by this grace, attain the supreme Dao.

**Mantra for Burning the Talisman to Shatter Fengdu**
The Great Dao of Jade Clarity flows into the cold courts.
The Supreme Unity of the Azure Mystery scatters true forms.
Illuminating Fengdu’s dark prisons and shadowy spirits,
transgressions vanish across kalpas; torments cease in the Three Ways.
Demon kings obey the command, receiving the decree of the Three Clarities.
Nether officials and ghostly clerks need not fear.
Ice and charcoal, furnaces and fires, forever still the underworld.
Swords and halberds are sheathed; all punishments cease.
The myriad spirits of the Origin rescue the condemned.
Swiftly ascend to the Supreme Unity to receive refinement in the Vermilion Mound.

**Memorial for Shattering Fengdu**
The Supreme Jade Clarity, the precious radiance of Brahma’s truth,
the mighty decree of the Origin, the deliverance register of treasures—
the Dao Lord issues the command to save and entrust Kunlun.
Shatter the iron enclosures, the dark yin of Fengdu.
The Ten Directions, Three Realms, and the divine lands of the Yellow Springs,
the Three Officials, Nine Bureaus, and Twelve River Sources—
release the departed from their transgressions, the kalpas of sin.
Eradicate evil roots, swiftly expunge the ledgers of guilt.
No detention is permitted; ascend at this very hour.
Myriad spirits escort them directly to the Southern Heaven.
According to their rank, they receive transformation and rebirth in the land of blessings,
all in accordance with this decree.

**Chapter on the Northern Feng**
The Master says: In the Northern Capital of Fengdu stands a mountain, its height and depth unfathomable, shrouded in the darkness of ten thousand kalpas. On all sides, above and below, it harbors dark prisons where condemned souls are imprisoned, enduring every suffering. Having established the grand retreat, one must extend compassion to universally deliver the sunken and lost. It is fitting to model the true form of Fengdu Mountain, arrange its likeness, and light lamps to redeem the sins of the departed. Employ these talismanic decrees to open the nether passes and rescue those in the ceaseless torment.

**Precious Proclamation of the Jade Clarity for Opening the Dark Night of Fengdu**
This is the talisman of the Heavenly Worthy who rescues suffering in the Ten Directions, as seen in the memorial for shattering prisons.
The Jade Clarity’s Great Cavern proclaims the precious register.
True spirits obey the decree, rescuing the cold courts.
Talismanic fire illuminates brilliantly, blazing through the Yellow Springs.
Grudges dissolve; karmic burdens are absolved.
The Ten Heavens’ edict commands universal deliverance.
River sources and Yellow Springs open the dark night.
Ice pools melt; swords and halberds are sheathed.
Demon kings and ghostly clerks all transform into immortals.
Deliver the departed souls, forever severing their bonds.

**Swiftly erase the ledgers of sin, that none may be detained or implicated.**
**The deceased souls receive deliverance, their years made equal to Heaven’s.**
**The Primordial Jade Talisman transforms life through natural generation.**
**All is as decreed in the proclamation.**
*Proclaimed on the [day] of the [year], [month], [day], and [hour] of the Great Year.*

*[Rank and Title] [Name] reverently receives the decree and puts it into practice.*

**Heavenly Worthy of the Vermilion Numinosity who Delivers Lives,**
**Perfected Master of the Heavenly Worthy who Rescues by Sound,**
**Ancestral Master of the Heavenly Worthy who Governs the Primordial.**

**The Jade Clarity’s Precious Proclamation is hereby issued to the Overseers of the Northern Capital of Fengdu.**

**The Radiant Return Chapter**
*Transmitted by Master Night-Perfected Quanzhen of the Cavernous Subtlety, Illuminator and Savior of Suffering, to Wang Qizhen, Disciple of the Three Caverns of Supreme Clarity and Successor in the Teaching of the Numinous Treasure*

The Master said: According to the *Scripture of the Twenty-Four Precepts*, all who live commit twenty-four kinds of sins, and thus after death receive retribution in twenty-four hells, passing through the realms of the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Sufferings, and the Eight Difficulties. Therefore, the Most High established the *Pattern of the Radiant Return and Descending Light*.

Before the establishment of the fast, erect the *Radiant Return Banner* in the southeast of the altar. Then, fashion a lamp-wheel from catalpa wood, shaped like a chariot axle, with three tiers and a central pillar. On the upper tier place twelve lamps, on the middle tier sixteen, and on the lower tier twenty-one, for a total of forty-nine. At the center, set up five tablets, each inscribed with the names of the various hells. Also prepare forty-nine small banners, alternating in yellow and white. On each banner, inscribe the title of the Heavenly Worthy according to the prescribed form, and at the top write the *Talisman for Shattering Fengdu*. It is fitting to invoke the talismanic commands in accordance with the ritual, widely enacting deliverance. Thus may the light of the Three Luminaries be turned back, obliquely illuminating the gates of the Nine Springs, so that myriad sins are extinguished and suffering souls receive salvation.

**Upper Prime Talisman for Extinguishing Desire and Severing the Corpse, Transforming Radiance and Flowing Light**
*Three Primes’ Yang Light Stabilizes Wisdom’s Mystic Pivot*
*Grievous Souls Don Cap and Sash, Their Power Harmonizes with the Mysterious Origin*

**Incantation for Severing the Upper Corpse**
The upper corpse, green with desire, styles itself Peng Ju.
Transforming into nine kinds, its head is crow-black, its body serpentine.
Chaotic and heartless, it sinks or floats at will.
Greedy for flavors, it dwells in florid beauty.
It races as human souls, while its *po* governs transgressions.
Severing life’s root, it scatters *qi* and sends spirits wandering.
Rampant through the Three Palaces, tiny worms suffer no toil.
True Person of Jia-Yi, inscribe the talismanic writ.
When desire for form is severed, the path of death is removed.
The Primordial Beginning commands: sever the corpse’s head!
The Three Terraces oversee its form—depart swiftly, tarry not.
Eradicate its root, extinguish its lineage, leave no remnant behind.
Let the deceased refine their truth; the Three Palaces become pure and vacant.
The Five Emperors descend in radiance; the Grand Unity inscribes the decree.
On an auspicious day, bathe and don cap and sash to perform the rites.
Soar through the celestial realms in a jade chariot of flowing light.
Pursue the radiance to Upper Clarity, riding clouds in carefree roaming.

**Announcement**
The Jade Clarity Talisman of Illuminating Light is proclaimed below to the officials of thunder and lightning who drive the Heavenly Wretched Path.
*Talisman*: This talisman is proclaimed below to the spirit-officials of the dead path of form’s root.
On behalf of the deceased [Name], sever and extinguish the Heavenly Wretched Path’s gate of the upper corpse’s path of form and desire. Exempt them from the Heavenly Bureau’s labor of driving thunder and lightning, from the bitterness of sorrow and torment. Ascend beyond the Three Realms, roam freely in Upper Clarity, all as commanded.

**Incantation for Severing the Middle Corpse**
The middle corpse, Peng Zhi, is called the Yellow Center.

**Incantation for the Five Sufferings Talismans**
The suffering of form’s afflictions—neither form nor heart.
The suffering of desire’s afflictions—desire itself is desireless.
The suffering of love’s afflictions—love is not love.
The suffering of greed’s afflictions—my form is not form.
The suffering of vainglory’s afflictions—neither true nor body.
The five afflictions all empty—form returns to celestial truth.
The karmic debts of the Six Paths—without love, without birth.
The accumulated fire is not repaid—debts are broken, form sealed.
My true self is one with truth—all Three Realms are empty.
The five aggregates of self are empty—I attain the state of the Perfected.
Ever preserving through kalpas, my lifespan equals Heaven’s.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Jade Clarity Highest Emperor decrees!*

For the five talismans above, visualize the body as the Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, grasp the Five Sufferings’ secret, and draw qi to blow upon them.

Dissolving the five afflictions, flying to deliver at Southern Prosperity.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Highest Emperor decrees!*

For the eight talismans, write in cinnabar on yellow paper; the announcement text in ink. Use blue paper for the envelope, inscribe its face in cinnabar. Burn them when breaking through the prisons.

**Incantation for Flying Deliverance of the House of Form’s Afflictions**
Dissolving form, vanishing, and transforming—discarding the corpse at the Five Gates.
The Three Desires now purified, the spirit’s ford is inwardly irrigated.
Shedding the old, refining the new—fragrant qi suffuses the body.
The Jade talisman extinguishes all bonds; the earthly realm holds no confinement.
Flying to deliver to the heavenly realms, transcending to the clouds’ edge.
The Demon Kings guard the true; qi harmonizes with the natural.
Seven ancestors ascend together, stepping through Heaven’s Gate.
The Five Emperors witness and reflect; all spirits hear and know.

**Incantation for Flying Deliverance of the House of Love’s Afflictions**
Clouds move, steps fly—vanishing in the Jade radiance.
Dissolving form, shedding the near, hair unbound, soaring.
Human afflictions unbound, riding emptiness to travel.
Heavenly demons dispelled, the Five Paths open.
Transcending the wind-blades, form ascends to the Upper Palace.

**Incantation for Flying Deliverance of the House of Greed’s Afflictions**
Dissolving form, transforming spirit—severing greed and delusion.
Transcending the bronze pillars, crossing beyond the ford of love.
The dark souls receive deliverance; suffering and bliss are all transmuted.
Seven ancestors are liberated; the Nine Mysteries are born in Heaven.
Greed’s afflictions forever cast off—spirit flies to become a celestial immortal.

**Incantation for Flying Deliverance of the House of Vainglory’s Afflictions**
Discarding the corpse, dissolving transgressions—spirit transcends the scalding waters.
Shearing away vainglory, extinguishing the roots of evil.
The deceased undergoes refinement; the Demon Kings protect their name.
Opening the King’s Way, harmonizing with the Perfected in sentiment.
Carefree and natural, ascending to feast in the Purple Court.

**Incantation for Flying Deliverance of the House of Bodily Afflictions**
The Jade talisman dissolves transgressions—spirit escapes the dark waves.
Sweeping away karmic obstacles, severing the roots of attachment.
The dark bureaus cease their accusations; the cold realm’s forms are stilled.
Departing the Northern Mansion, spirit attains rebirth.
Joyful and unburdened, carefree in the Great Void.

**On the Cultivation of the Dao**

Generally, those who cultivate the Dao may, on the days of *gengshen* and *jiazi*, inscribe the **Five Afflictions Talisman** in cinnabar upon yellow paper and ingest it to expel the **Three Corpses** and dispel the **Five Afflictions**. They should recite the **Chapter of the Afflicted Spirits**. This hymn was composed by the **Dao Lord** during his journey through the Eight Gates, where he witnessed the dark prisons, layered barriers, and the **Three Rivers and Nine Streams**—the **Mountains of Knives** and **Forests of Swords**—where imprisoned hungry ghosts and punished dead souls were dragged through mire and ashes, their forms unrecognizable. Unable to bear the sight, he was moved to sorrow and thus composed this hymn.

**Chapter of the Afflicted Spirits**
Born into the realm of suffering spirits,
they revolve through the courts of the Five Paths.
The **Nine Dark Realms** unfold in endless night,
through kalpas without light.
Knife-mountains and sword-forests stand,
their poisoned blades jagged and grim.
No flocks of birds gather—
only the wails of afflicted souls are heard.
The whirling wind sways the long branches,
and once it reaches the cold courts, echoes resound.
Above, the **Mountain-Treading Ones** tread ceaselessly,
their steps unrelenting.
Hungry, they feed on spring’s bitter charcoal;
thirsty, they drink the essence of smelting fires.
Dragged through the boundless mire,
how could they know form or name?
Pity those who know not their fate—
how sorrowful, how grievous to the human heart.
Sin and fortune each arise from causes,
good and evil truly stem from the mind.
The wheel turns without end,
its echoes never ceasing.
The **Nine Dark Realms** hold records of existence and void,
through ten thousand kalpas, they seek one another.
The source of endless icy cold,
the long night shrouded in layered shadows.
No sight of virtue and power conjoined—
only the forest of destitute ghosts.
The Long River cannot be dammed,
as suffering souls cling to the axle and wail.
Their voices reach the edge of the sword-forest,
their lamentations fall upon the knife-peaks.
This form is no longer a form—
how painful, how grievous to the human breast.

**Chapter of the Birth-Monitoring Bureau**
The Master says: In conducting grand rituals, one must strive for broad deliverance. Among the hidden and wandering souls, there may be those who perished in childbirth, their fetal bonds lingering, mother and child undivided. Thus, the **Most High**, moved by compassion, established the **Birth-Monitoring Bureau**, dedicated to the affairs of female spirits. He issued talismanic methods to save and aid them—its merit is boundless.

**True Writ of the Birth-Monitoring Bureau**
*Fēi Xuán Yuán Qì Jié Chéng Zhēn Wén*
*Sǐ Hái Kāi Dù Wàn Pǐn Kāi Gēn*
This **True Writ** is placed upon the altar of the **Birth-Monitoring Bureau**. When the deceased behold it, their hundred bones radiate light, dispelling the foul qi of the corpse.

**Talisman for the Born and Unborn**
By the **Jade Clarity Mudra**, absorb the **eastern qi**, and visualize entering the curtain.
Reverently invoke the **Great Spirit of the Nine Heavens, the Life-Giving Lord**, the **Holy Mother Who Guards the Chamber**, the **Celestial Physicians Who Heal Diseases**, and all others. At this moment, lead forth the souls of those who perished in the **Blood Lake**, those undelivered in childbirth, into the curtain, that they may be delivered and reborn in the heavens or among humans.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in the statutes and ordinances.*

**Incantation**

**Heavenly Physician’s Chapter of Salvation and Healing**

The Master said: Many in the world perish from illness, and when the ten aspects of their form are incomplete, their souls carry afflictions—how then may they ascend the altar to receive deliverance? Thus, the Most High established the **Heavenly Physician’s** method of rescue and upliftment, relying on talismanic writs to restore their forms. Is this not a great boon?

**Numinous Treasure Talisman of the Five Spirits**
The ninefold radiance and threefold qi,
the seven regulators and five constants.
The august Central Sovereign descends,
bestowing primordial yang.

*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

This method may be further enhanced with the **Five Sprouts**.

**Declaration**
The **Numinous Treasure Talisman of the Five Spirits** is hereby proclaimed to the **Heavenly Physician’s Bureau** and all its attending officials.

**Talisman**
By command of the **Numinous Treasure Teachings**, the **Heavenly Physician** is summoned.
Let the **Wood Palace** administer remedies,
the **Fire Palace** apply moxibustion,
the **Metal Palace** wield needles,
the **Water Palace** prepare decoctions,
the **Earth Palace** compound formulas,
each according to their prescribed domain.
For those about to receive deliverance—
the wandering souls and orphaned spirits—
diagnose and treat their ailments,
that the deaf may regain hearing,
the blind may see,
the mute may speak,
the lame may walk.
Chronic illnesses and deep-seated afflictions,
all shall be restored to wholeness;
white hair shall turn black again,
fallen teeth shall regrow.
For women with child,
for birds and beasts with young,
for those already born and those yet unborn,
all shall attain birth and completion.
The dead shall rise from their corpses,
bones shall be made flesh.
The **Azure Emperor** guards the hun-soul,
the **White Emperor** attends the po-soul,
the **Vermilion Emperor** nurtures qi,
the **Black Emperor** regulates blood,
the **Yellow Emperor** governs the center.
The myriad spirits shall not transgress,
the five qi shall be harmonized within,
the hundred spirits shall merge as one.
The body shall be restored to receive deliverance,
and ascend carefree to the **Upper Clarity**.

*All as commanded.*

Proclaimed on the [day] of the [month] of the [year] of the **Great Year**,
by [rank and title] your servant [Name],
in reverent compliance with the edict.

Thus the Supreme Mystery bestows precious talismans, that the five fragrant [waters] may irrigate and purify the hun and shen, in hope of transcendent transformation.
