Memorial of Supplication for Merit and Pardon

Your subordinate humbly submits this petition to the Celestial Hearing, beseeching clemency. On the [day] of this month, I presented a memorial detailing how the Ritual Master [Name] solemnly conducted the **Supreme Yellow Register Great Offering**, to deliver the departed souls of [Name] and others, that they might together attain rebirth in the proper realm.

I strictly adhered to the ritual codes, reverently initiating the offering, reciting the true scriptures, harmonizing Heaven and Earth, and invoking the descent of officials and spirits to guard the altar. Through the encompassing grace of their protection, the ritual achieved its perfected fruition. Now, as the altar is dismantled and the assembly dispersed, I submit this report of merit, proffering this memorial in reverence, and offering gratitude in accordance with the directions.

I humbly implore Your Celestial Compassion to deign to review this petition, commanding the divine officials of this realm to descend from the **Divine Realm of the Supreme Ultimate**, elevating the departed souls and illuminating their virtuous reward. May blessings flow to the ritual’s sponsor and felicity extend to the state and household.

All the originally descended perfected immortals, in accordance with principle, should return to their origins. I beseech that their merits be calculated and rewarded, their ranks advanced, and their honors exalted.

Your subordinates, unenlightened in ritual methods and bound by established codes, humbly pray for leniency and exemption from severe punishment. May Your abundant grace be fully bestowed, completing the beneficence from beginning to end.

I respectfully present this memorial in supplication and gratitude, daring to offend Your Celestial Majesty. My trembling heart knows no bounds as I await Your judgment.

Respectfully submitted.

Before the August Presence of the Eastern Infinite Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy and the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords, I, your subordinate of such-and-such rank and surname, humbly await Your Sagely Decree. On the day of such-and-such month and year, I present this memorial.

The sacred ranks of the ten directions shift and transform according to their quarters. The memorial of gratitude is identical to the memorial of audience; both are respectfully submitted to the palace of such-and-such direction. I, your subordinate of such-and-such rank and surname, reverently seal this document anew.

Memorial to the Ten Directions’ Numinous Officials:
I, your subordinate of such-and-such rank and surname, having reviewed the petition previously submitted by the ritual master so-and-so, beseeching the deliverance of the departed souls of so-and-so and others through the solemn establishment of the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Ritual at such-and-such location to amass hidden merits for their transcendence, found the plea impossible to refuse. Having already memorialized the Celestial Court to implore Your grace for deliverance, I now, at the initial opening of the sacred altar and the revelation of the true scriptures, respectfully offer patterned silk of dragon-and-jade design, paper, brush, ink, and inkstone, distributing and consecrating them to each direction as tokens of sincerity and pledges to the perfected. To convey this devotion and supplicate divine response, it is necessary to present this memorial for Your august consideration.

To the right, beneath the vast expanse of Brahmā’s qi and the boundless realm of the nine heavens, lies the distant and desolate true capital, the towering homeland of the ten poles. Yearning for my crimson sincerity to ascend and be heard, I rely upon Your vast compassion to transmit and memorialize this plea.

Reverently considering the boundless worlds of the ten directions, the scriptures and treasures of the palaces of sun, moon, and stars, the watery domains of the Five Marchmounts, and the divine officials and immortals of the ten realms—may this memorial be transmitted before the sacred assembly. The True and Constant respond with goodness; their numinous transformations know no bounds. Ever delivering the dead to succor the living, they part their spirit to descend into the world.

May they deign to survey this rite of purification across its thresholds, heeding these earnest vows. Through ninefold memorials may faults be absolved, trusting in their compassion to pardon transgressions. For this single occasion of revealed affairs, may they grant the brush to record merit. Thus may grace bathe all, suffusing both the hidden and the manifest.

This humble servant’s heart brims with unbearable fervor. Respectfully this memorial is presented for august perusal.

Thus, we humbly reflect: the supreme true teachings are the ladder between humanity and heaven; the titles of great compassion serve as the bridge between life and death. Their virtue is boundless, and their goodness knows no limit. We earnestly recall that the souls of the departed, such as [Name], have returned to the nine nights, their spirits obscured from the One True. Without the guidance to dispel their delusion, how may they escape their sunken state? We pray that the golden mouths may proclaim the wondrous teachings, that they may directly awaken to the subtle mysteries. May they suddenly perceive the clarity of the ice-pure vessel, forever free from defilement. As we open the treasure trove of scriptures, we first reveal our sincere devotion. We reverently beseech the penetrating gaze of the enlightened to grant our prayer for deliverance and cultivation.

The minister prostrates himself to declare the purpose of this fast and the ritual implements to be employed. A formal request has been submitted to the gate of [Name], beseeching the attendance of a Daoist master to conduct a single altar. On the ___ day of the ___ month, at [Location], a grand and supreme Yellow Register Fast of three days and nights shall be solemnly established. Upon its completion and dispersal, a thanksgiving purification rite of three hundred and sixty divine positions shall be held, relying upon the grace of the Dao to universally deliver the departed souls, broadly aiding those sunk in darkness, that all may together attain rebirth in the proper realm.

Now that the present offering has been made and the primary cause has been harmoniously fulfilled, all the reverent offerings and dedicatory scriptures, along with the sagely titles for the deliverance of the departed, are enumerated and respectfully presented below.

First, a Daoist master is invited to recite [Name of Scripture].
Each item shall be listed in full detail, following the format of the Opening Scripture Memorial.

Prostrating, we reflect that the sacred texts, stored in fragrant bamboo cases and jade boxes, hold the profound mysteries of the Dao’s subtle essence. Inscribed in golden characters upon jade tablets, they proclaim the rites of liberation and salvation. Without scripture, nothing is accomplished; with karmic affinity, all may encounter the Way. We humbly recall that the departed [Name] and our ancestors, kin by blood and marriage, whether manifest or hidden, have wandered far along the dark paths of the unseen realm, where the way to awakening is difficult to find. Longing for liberation yet finding no means, they have drifted away and cannot return. Thus, we solemnly convene this ritual fast, gathering hidden merit in the hope of relying upon the true vehicle to open the gates of wisdom.

We humbly pray that the radiance of Your grace may illumine all, unfolding the clarity of the jeweled mirror. May the shores of the Dao extend broadly, and the realms enter the splendor of the celestial vessel. May all sentient beings be equally saved, and the dharma-realm universally aided.

Now, in reverent accordance with the ritual codes, a grand nocturnal offering is universally performed to broadly succor the hidden spirits of the Six Paths and the orphaned souls of the Nine Provinces. Yet, we fear that the realms of darkness and light may remain divided, and the roads obstructed. Thus, this document is issued.

We hereby document our request that you swiftly dispatch your flying talismans, obey the command, and hasten forth. From the celestial officials of the Green Rider’s Heaven, clear the blockages and obstructions. Open the ghostly gates of the Gen direction, ensuring unimpeded passage.

Upon receipt of this document, act in accordance with the ritual codes without delay, and promptly respond.
